[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D3790}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pany+tsa bing sha ti sa ha sri ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta[#]/_bod skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang
[\[1b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang /_/'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis
[\[1b.3\]]'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang /_/gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa[#]/_/nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum
[\[1b.4\]]de la phyag 'tshal[#]/_/rgyal sras gang dag skye bo ma lus bsgral phyir byang chub tu ni yid byas dang /_/so sor byang chub rtogs nas gang dag slar yang mnyam med sgom par byed rnams dang /_/slob ma
[\[1b.5\]]dang ni slob ma'i lam 'gro nyon mongs zil mnan 'gro ba gang yin pa/_/de dag thams cad dam pa'i chos mnyan phyir na rab dga'i yid kyis 'dir spyon cig_/gang phyir dri ma mang pos dus 'di de
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]bzhin ma yin 'gro ba 'di yin zhing /_/lta ba mchog tu mi legs chags sdang mun pa rab tu lhag gyur mi g.yo la/_/tshe yang ring po med dang mun pas dri bral snang ba bzang po dang ldan pas[#]/_/the tshom yul min mdo 'di
[\[2a.2\]]kye ma rnyed dka' bas na rig [#]par bdag gis dbye/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa na bzhugs te/_dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
[\[2a.3\]]thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_
[\[2a.4\]]khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa rnams dang
[\[2a.5\]]thabs cig go/_/gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang /_dge bsnyen ma [#]dang /_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba [#]kun kyang chos mthong ba dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_stong pa nyid kyi [#]
[\[2b.2\]]rnam par spyod pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/_rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis bzod pa rab tu thob pa/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/_mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/_mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang
[\[2b.3\]]ldan pa/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_kha gsag med pa/_grags pa dang /_khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pa/_zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/_chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/_mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/_bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag
[\[2b.4\]]par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/_chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams [#]pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_sngon du smra ba/_khro gnyer med pa/_pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su
[\[2b.5\]]brjod pa [#]mkhas pa/_zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba/_spobs pa mi chod pa/_'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis mnan [#]pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pa las nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_
[\[2b.6\]]rmi lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa lta bur lhag par mos pa dang [#]/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud [#]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba dang /_spyod pa dang [#]/_mos pa phra mo sna tshogs la 'jug par mkhas pa/_sems can
[\[2b.7\]]thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa mtha' yas par smon pa dang 'jug pa yongs su gzung [#]ba/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/_sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs dang bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs
[\[3a.2\]]pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa brgyad [#]stong mngon par sgrub [#]pa la mkhas pa/_yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/_'di lta ste skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[3a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon dam pa dang /_skyes bus byin [#]dang /_chus byin dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_blo gros dam pa dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_blo gros 'phel ba dang /_don yod mthong ba dang /_rab tu zhugs pa dang /_
[\[3a.4\]]rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_rtag tu brtson pa dang /_rtag tu sbyor ba dang /_mi gtong brtson pa dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_blo gros dpe med pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /_mthu chen thob pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rdo rje blo gros dang /_lag
[\[3a.5\]]na rin chen phyag rgya dang /_rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig go/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bshams
[\[3a.6\]]nas/_sku drang por bsrangs te dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad khongs su chud pas 'du ba dang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
[\[3a.7\]]par gzhag [#]go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_lha'i spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/_/de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad las 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/_de'i zhabs kyi
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i [#]rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs long bu gnyis dang /_zhabs byin pa gnyis dang /_zhabs
[\[3b.2\]]pus mo gnyis dang /_zhabs brla gnyis dang /_sku lta [#]zur gnyis dang /_sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_sku rtsib [#]logs gnyis dang /_thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/phyag gi sor
[\[3b.3\]]mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang /_dpung pa gnyis dang /_mgur dang /_tshems mche ba bzhi dang /_tshems bzhi bcu dang /_spyan gnyis dang /_snyan gnyis dang /_shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang /_
[\[3b.4\]]smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang /_steng gi spyi gtsug dang /_zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/_'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis [#]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad
[\[3b.5\]]snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/de bzhin du/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_
[\[3b.6\]]'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs [#]re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang /_'od zer des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[3b.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye [#]ba mdzad de/_ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/'od zer des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[4a.2\]]nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad
[\[4a.3\]]kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gang yin pa des/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad pa dang /_
[\[4a.4\]]phyogs bcu po rnams thams cad kyi phyogs re rer/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rang bzhin gyi 'od des khyab par mdzad nas/_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i bar du
[\[4a.5\]]gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang po des khyab par mdzad nas/_ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od rab tu bkye ste/_'od de las 'od zer bye
[\[4a.6\]]ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon [#]to/_/'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar [##]gyur to/_/pad+mo [#]de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos ston par mdzad cing gnas pa rnams bzhugs te/_'di
[\[4a.7\]]lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa [#]mdzad do/_/de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]to/_/de bzhin du de dag lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas
[\[4b.2\]]kyang 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi [#]chos ston to/_/sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng
[\[4b.3\]]ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/_de lta bu'i gzugs kyis [#]rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
[\[4b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul to/_/rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go/_/rab tu ldeg go/_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/chem/_rab tu chem/_kun tu rab tu chem mo/_/
[\[4b.5\]]'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/_dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba
[\[4b.6\]]bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang dag yod pa de dag rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur to/_/mi khom
[\[4b.7\]]pa thams cad kyang zad par gyur to/_/sems can gang dag dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten [#]las shi 'phos pa de dag kyang dang ba dang rab tu dga' ba de nyid kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de bzhin du rgyal chen
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan [#]'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mthus sngon gyi
[\[5a.2\]]tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas dang ba dang rab tu dga' bas bcom ldan 'das gang [#]na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de bzhin du shar
[\[5a.3\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs bcu po rnams kun tu phyogs kyi cha re rer 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
[\[5a.4\]]snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can gang dag dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[5a.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas shi 'phos pa de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/mi dang lha rnams su skyes pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mthus sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dang ba dang rab tu dga' ba
[\[5a.6\]]de nyid kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung bar gyur pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_thams cad thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'dud par gyur to/_/
[\[5a.7\]]de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/_/sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/_/smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]gyur to/_/sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang sems rtse gcig pa thob par gyur to/_/gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to/_/bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/_/skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/_/
[\[5b.2\]]nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/_/lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams
[\[5b.3\]]kyang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/_pha dang /_ma dang /_phu nu dang /_sring mo dang /_mdza' ba dang /_gnyen dang /_grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems
[\[5b.4\]]kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_gtsang ba dang nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/_mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang
[\[5b.5\]]ldan par gyur to/_/'di lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/_dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang ldan par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na
[\[5b.6\]]bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dul ba ni legs so/_/zhi ba ni legs so/_/yang dag par sdom pa ni legs so/_/yun ring du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs so/_/srog chags su gyur pa rnams la mi 'tshe ba ni legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
[\[5b.7\]]brjod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma sgrib [#]pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/_zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang bcas pa/_lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_dbang byed dang bcas pa/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs
[\[6a.2\]]na/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes
[\[6a.3\]]shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_
[\[6a.4\]]byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi [#]phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung [#]gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham
[\[6a.5\]]me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon [#]par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas
[\[6a.6\]]pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang
[\[6a.7\]]bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang bcas pa dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba bzhin du bstan to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_tshangs ris dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang
[\[6b.2\]]byed dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'thab bral dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la
[\[6b.3\]]bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang /_yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la
[\[6b.4\]]dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu ta [#]dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_na li na dang /_sau gan d+hi dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang /_ta ma li'i [#]lo ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/_bcom
[\[6b.5\]]ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_byug spos dang /_ut+pa la dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu ta dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_na li na dang /_sau gan d+hi [#]dang /_me tog ke [#]sa ra dang /_ta ma li'i [#]lo ma dang /_
[\[6b.6\]]lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig
[\[6b.7\]]yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang /_thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/_/me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma la sogs pa dang /_na bza'
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs [#]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong
[\[7a.2\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/_/mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/_/rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/_/me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis [#]stong gsum gyi
[\[7a.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger gyur te[#]/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ci lta ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig
[\[7a.4\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re
[\[7a.5\]]zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta [#]bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin
[\[7a.6\]]gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags po dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams
[\[7a.7\]]kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du stong [#]gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye [#]bar mdzad de/_yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[7b.2\]]'di rab tu [#]snang bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab
[\[7b.3\]]tu snang bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
[\[7b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong
[\[7b.5\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/
[\[7b.6\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang
[\[7b.7\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]de dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge
[\[8a.2\]]'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya
[\[8a.3\]]ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing /_'tsho la skyong bar byed de/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di nyid ston
[\[8a.4\]]par mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan
[\[8a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol
[\[8a.6\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung [#]ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
[\[8a.7\]]chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/des [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas
[\[8b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[8b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_
[\[8b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas
[\[8b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur [#]te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de
[\[8b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+ma [#]'di dag gis gtor te/_'di skad du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs
[\[8b.7\]]spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[9a.2\]]dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de nas pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_
[\[9a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
[\[9a.4\]]de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gro [#]bya ba dang /_bkur sti [#]bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod
[\[9a.5\]]pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
[\[9a.6\]]spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[9a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+ma [#]gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_shar
[\[9b.2\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la
[\[9b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de [#]sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[9b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang /_
[\[9b.5\]]rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror [#]byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lho phyogs
[\[9b.6\]]logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de dag kun gyi pha rol na/[#]de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[9b.7\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho la skyong bar byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu [#]phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par [#]mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[10a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu
[\[10a.3\]]'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'
[\[10a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[10a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
[\[10a.6\]]dang bral bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[10a.7\]]shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur [#]pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis
[\[10b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral ba la pad+mo rin po che [#]sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/_'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur ro[#]/_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[10b.3\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/_'di skad du bcom ldan 'das mya ngan med pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes
[\[10b.4\]]rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo de dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i
[\[10b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
[\[10b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
[\[10b.7\]]lhan cig kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par [#]byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_
[\[11a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[11a.3\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal bcom ldan
[\[11a.4\]]'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
[\[11a.5\]]med pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
[\[11a.6\]]gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos
[\[11a.7\]]bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/
[\[11b.2\]]bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las pha rol po'i [#]'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba gang yin
[\[11b.3\]]pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong bar byed de/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa [#]mdzad do/_/
[\[11b.4\]]de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas [#]chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[\[11b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro [#]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[11b.6\]]'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher [#]g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba [#]rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[11b.7\]]po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba de ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i
[\[12a.2\]]blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad [#]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag
[\[12a.3\]]bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob [#]pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad
[\[12a.4\]]du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la
[\[12a.5\]]pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/_'di skad
[\[12a.6\]]du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros [#]bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[12a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu
[\[12b.2\]]snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_nub phyogs kyi sangs
[\[12b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba
[\[12b.4\]]dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang
[\[12b.5\]]na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces
[\[12b.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros [#]bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam
[\[12b.7\]]zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]de dag bzhes nas/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor ro[#]/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
[\[13a.2\]]thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur
[\[13a.3\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba
[\[13a.4\]]de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu
[\[13a.5\]]'khod do/_/de nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po
[\[13a.6\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par [#]mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug
[\[13a.7\]]pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad
[\[13b.2\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
[\[13b.3\]]pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[13b.4\]]ston te/_'di 'dra ba de [#]ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
[\[13b.5\]]der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs
[\[13b.6\]]dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i
[\[13b.7\]]dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/_'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i dbang pos [#]bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs
[\[14a.2\]]gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang [#]bskur ro
[\[14a.3\]]zhes smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'
[\[14a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_
[\[14a.5\]]rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_
[\[14a.6\]]spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[14a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[14b.2\]]rgyal ba'i dbang pos[#]/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de
[\[14b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas
[\[14b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[14b.5\]]tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu
[\[14b.6\]]mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim
[\[14b.7\]]gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las [#]pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
[\[15a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas [#]rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin
[\[15a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi
[\[15a.4\]]glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa
[\[15a.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal [#]to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[15a.6\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
[\[15a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi shing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[15b.2\]]chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa dang [#]/_gzungs [#]dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po
[\[15b.3\]]dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' [#]rnam par rgyal bas rnam par
[\[15b.4\]]gnon pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis
[\[15b.5\]]gtor te/_'di skad du bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la [#]bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de
[\[15b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir [#]bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten
[\[15b.7\]]gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs
[\[16a.2\]]su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug
[\[16a.3\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_
[\[16a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu
[\[16a.5\]]'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[16a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong
[\[16a.7\]]dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_byang shar gyi
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_
[\[16b.2\]]pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
[\[16b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal [#]ba de nas 'ongs pa
[\[16b.4\]]de dag [#]kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par [#]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir [#]byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[16b.5\]]de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi [#]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
[\[16b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo [#]/_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa'
[\[16b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pa [#]snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_
[\[17a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i [#]rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[17a.3\]]rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
[\[17a.4\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[\[17a.5\]]gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing
[\[17a.6\]]bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i
[\[17a.7\]]slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo la pad+mo
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo de [#]dag gis gtor te/_'di skad du
[\[17b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das pad+mo dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[17b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
[\[17b.4\]]dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog
[\[17b.5\]]tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
[\[17b.6\]]kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya
[\[17b.7\]]ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya [#]dang /_mchod par [#]byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang [#]/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
[\[18a.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg
[\[18a.3\]]par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/
[\[18a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[18a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag las [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_
[\[18a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_
[\[18a.7\]]khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las
[\[18b.2\]]pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[18b.3\]]chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par [#]mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin
[\[18b.4\]]gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i
[\[18b.5\]]dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol
[\[18b.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar gyi
[\[18b.7\]]phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba [#]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang
[\[19a.2\]]ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur
[\[19a.3\]]ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/
[\[19a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i
[\[19a.5\]]dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur [#]te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[\[19a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/_'di skad du bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang
[\[19a.7\]]ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]smros shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'
[\[19b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su
[\[19b.3\]]'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_
[\[19b.4\]]phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems
[\[19b.5\]]dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu
[\[19b.6\]]'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/_bcom
[\[19b.7\]]ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/_'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[20a.2\]]shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi
[\[20a.3\]]khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis
[\[20a.4\]]thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi
[\[20a.5\]]khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod
[\[20a.6\]]par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[20a.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[20b.2\]]sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_
[\[20b.3\]]dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen
[\[20b.4\]]mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni [#]shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[20b.5\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis bcom ldan
[\[20b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag
[\[20b.7\]]bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub [#]pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs
[\[21a.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi [#]rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod
[\[21a.3\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de [#]la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/_'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pas bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma mchis sam/_
[\[21a.4\]]ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma [#]'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros
[\[21a.5\]]shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'
[\[21a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_
[\[21a.7\]]rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod
[\[21b.2\]]par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
[\[21b.3\]]la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
[\[21b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa[#]/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs gzer ma [#]mchis sam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_gshegs spyod dam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa
[\[21b.5\]]'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[21b.6\]]shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten
[\[21b.7\]]gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
[\[22a.2\]]mchog dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa de nas 'ongs pa [#]de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti
[\[22a.3\]]stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[22a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par [#]mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi [#]khams de na byang chub
[\[22a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[22a.6\]]sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di
[\[22a.7\]]ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i [#]rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/_byang chub
[\[22b\]]
