[\[62a.6\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i [#]mig gis
[\[62a.7\]]shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o snyam du mi [#]sems so/_/lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi [#]lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho
[\[62b.2\]]ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
[\[62b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig [#]gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/
[\[62b.4\]]de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi [#]lha'i mig gis
[\[62b.5\]]byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu
[\[62b.6\]]'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du/_bdag gis lha'i mig gis byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems
[\[62b.7\]]can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i
[\[63a.2\]]rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di
[\[63a.3\]]snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis lho nub kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid
[\[63a.4\]]kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi [#]lha'i mig gis nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
[\[63a.5\]]rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA
[\[63a.6\]]ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/
[\[63a.7\]]de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi [#]lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu
[\[63b.2\]]'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed par brtson pa yin no
[\[63b.3\]]zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di'i 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal [#]bar
[\[63b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi [#]nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa
[\[63b.5\]]rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_
[\[63b.6\]]tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba [#]dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi
[\[63b.7\]]lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
[\[64a.2\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_
[\[64a.3\]]tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba
[\[64a.4\]]dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar
[\[64a.5\]]byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de [#]dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa kho nar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu
[\[64a.6\]]nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa
[\[64a.7\]]dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba [#]dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub
[\[64b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
[\[64b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi
[\[64b.4\]]nyan thos gang dag [#]yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i
[\[64b.5\]]mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba [#]dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can
[\[64b.6\]]dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba
[\[64b.7\]]gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen
[\[65a.2\]]ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan
[\[65a.3\]]pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom
[\[65a.4\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[65a.5\]]dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di [#]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[65a.6\]]po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang
[\[65a.7\]]dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su skyong [#]bar byed do/_/
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu nub byang gi phyogs kyi
[\[65b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min
[\[65b.3\]]gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir
[\[65b.4\]]zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
[\[65b.5\]]shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed
[\[65b.6\]]par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas
[\[65b.7\]]khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dag yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung [#]bar byed do/_/de la lus kyi
[\[66a.2\]]skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i [#]phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
[\[66a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni tshegs chung ngus gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro/_/skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
[\[66a.4\]]rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[66a.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du gang zhig chos rnams dang lhan cig ldan pa 'am/_bral ba 'am/_'du ba 'am/_
[\[66a.6\]]dbye ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod do zhes sems par byed pa med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang zhig ldan pa 'am/_bral ba 'am/_'du ba 'am/_dbye ba'i chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi
[\[66a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa [#]la ni 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]shin tu myur bar chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/_'on te [#]mi 'gyur zhes
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]bya bar sems pa med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings kyi [#]chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[66b.2\]]spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu [#]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'ga' yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos kyi dbyings la chos sna tshogs su yang 'byed par
[\[66b.3\]]mi byed la/_de 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di yang 'di ltar rtogs sam mi rtogs snyam du sems pa yang med/_'di ltar chos gang gis chos de dag rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang des yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/_/'di ltar des ni chos kyi dbyings la stong
[\[66b.4\]]pa'o zhes sbyor bar mi byed mi stong [#]zhes sbyor bar mi byed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[66b.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mig gi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la mig gi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/gzugs kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/mig gi rnam par shes
[\[66b.6\]]pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams [#]kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/rna ba'i khams la [#]stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la rna ba'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/sgra'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi
[\[66b.7\]]byed/_stong pa nyid la sgra'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/sna'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis [#]sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sna'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/dri'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la dri'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par
[\[67a.2\]]shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/lce'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la lce'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/ro'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la ro'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
[\[67a.3\]]khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/lus kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la lus kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/reg bya'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor
[\[67a.4\]]bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la reg bya'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/yid kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_
[\[67a.5\]]stong pa nyid la yid kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/chos kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la chos kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/_stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes
[\[67a.6\]]pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan
[\[67a.7\]]thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/mchog dang /_rab mchog dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang /_
[\[67b.2\]]gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di ni bla na med pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson
[\[67b.3\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung ste/[#]lung du bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur/_
[\[67b.4\]]yang 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/_/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/bdag gis ni bla
[\[67b.5\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des [#]chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bral bar mi byed cing gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/_gang
[\[67b.6\]]la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis [#]lung bstan par bya ba [#]chos kyi dbyings las gzhan pa'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can gyi 'du
[\[67b.7\]]shes mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med do/_/gang la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_shA ri'i bu de ltar
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha
[\[68a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor te/_des de ma yin pa'i rnal
[\[68a.3\]]'byor rnams zil gyis gnon [#]te gnas so/_/shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/ser sna'i sems mi skyed [#]do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems mi skyed [#]
[\[68a.4\]]do/_/gnod pa'i sems mi skyed[#]/_le lo'i sems mi skyed[#]/_rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems mi skyed[#]/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do [#]zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la gdams pa'o/_/[#]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan
[\[68a.5\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/_'di nas shi 'phos nas [#]gang du skye bar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol
[\[68a.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am[#]/_
[\[68a.7\]]dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas [#]shi 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul po yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog par [#]ma yin te/_de la gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du
[\[68b.2\]]mngon du mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
[\[68b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[68b.4\]]rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/_nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/[#]
[\[68b.5\]]shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes pa de'i dbang po rnams rno bar 'gyur zhing des [#]myur du rnal 'byor 'di 'grub par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ro/_/
[\[68b.6\]]skye ba brjes kyang de la chos zab mo zab mo dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te/_des phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[68b.7\]]rnams mnyes par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po shin tu rno bar 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]sgo thams cad kyang mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyor ba la brtson
[\[69a.2\]]par byed pa na/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mi [#]mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_/shA ri'i bu
[\[69a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la [#]mi mkhas pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi po rnams sgrub par byed cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par byed cing bsam gtan thob pa des kyang lha tshe ring po rnams su skyes te/_de nas shi 'phos nas de gal te 'dod pa'i
[\[69a.4\]]khams kyi lha dang mi rnams su skye zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba ni/_de dag gi dbang po rnams rtul por 'gyur zhing rnon por [#]'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan
[\[69a.5\]]la yang mnyam par gzhog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de/_de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas [#]bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang [#]yod de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te
[\[69a.6\]]dbang po rno ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po rnams skyed [#]de/_tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzugs med
[\[69a.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_bsam gtan gyi dbang po [#]dang /_
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]tshad med pa'i dbang po [#]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar snying rje chen po can thabs mkhas pas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par skye ba yang yod de/_de dag ni
[\[69b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [#]rgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[69b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi pa [#]la yang snyoms par 'jug_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag
[\[69b.4\]]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams sgom par byed/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed/_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par
[\[69b.5\]]byed/_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed cing /_de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas nas des tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_slar yang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te[#]/_
[\[69b.6\]]de dag der tshe ji srid du gnas nas dbang po mnyam [#]pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/_mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[69b.7\]]'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug po rnams thob pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]skye'o[#]/_/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
[\[70a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
[\[70a.3\]]kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse [#]zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
[\[70a.4\]]du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba gang yin pa de dag der song nas/_'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos
[\[70a.5\]]kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra rnams sgrog [#]par byed cing dkon mchog gsum po rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod de/_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra des de dag
[\[70a.6\]]sems dang bar gyur [#]te/_de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa
[\[70a.7\]]bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed [#]nas/_yang de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar byed de/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[70b.2\]]po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag kyang thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug
[\[70b.3\]]pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/_de dag der gnas shing
[\[70b.4\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_
[\[70b.5\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas 'phos par [#]'gyur ba de dag thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'og min gyi bar du skye'o/_/de dag de na yang tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te/_tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag
[\[70b.6\]]der gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba 'debs
[\[70b.7\]]par byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rigs nas [#]rigs su skye ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi thob pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du thob pa dang /_de dag rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams thob pa yin yang de dag mngon du mi byed pa dag yod de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad gcig pa yin no/_/[#]
[\[71a.2\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung [#]ste/_bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang /_dran pa nye bar
[\[71a.3\]]gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam sgom par byed pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[71a.4\]]thob pa dag thabs la mkhas pas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing des [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par [#]sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni bar ma dor yongs su mya
[\[71a.5\]]ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can gzhal du med grangs med
[\[71a.6\]]pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing /_de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni skyes nas
[\[71a.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag tu yang sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par byed do/_/de
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]dag sems can rnams kyi don la rtag par brtson te nam yang don med pa'i tshig mi smra'o/_/sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa
[\[71b.2\]]grangs med gzhal du med pa rnams kyi [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[71b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa las yang dag par 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang nges par gnas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bskrun par byed pa dag yod do/_/shA ri'i bu
[\[71b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du [#]
[\[71b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
[\[71b.6\]]bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_
[\[71b.7\]]sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang /_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang /_de bzhin du dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug spos dang /_mal stan dang /_rten ma dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mu tig dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_byi ru rnams dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub par byed pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rnams rab tu bkod de/_tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes nas sangs
[\[72a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu [#]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'og min gyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te/_bsam
[\[72a.3\]]gtan rnams las yongs su nyams nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye zhing de dag [#]bsam gtan rnams bsgrubs nas 'og min gyi bar du skyes nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
[\[72a.4\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'phar ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skyes te/_gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam gnyis las rgal te 'og min du
[\[72a.5\]]skyes nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yod do zhes bya ba ni phyed du 'phar ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag nyid kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[72a.6\]]sku lta bur sprul nas dga' ldan gyi gnas sbyangs shing tshangs ris kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi lha'i bar du skyes te/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams la chos ston cing /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la yang chos ston pa dag
[\[72a.7\]]yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing bdag nyid kyi [#]lus sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma
[\[72b.2\]]yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub [#]cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs [#]pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub
[\[72b.3\]]dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen
[\[72b.4\]]bkur bar byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba dang khyad par du 'phags
[\[72b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub [#]cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar [#]byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
[\[72b.6\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med par [#]sgrub par byed pa dag tshangs ris nas dge rgyas kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye zhing /_de nas
[\[72b.7\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar byed de/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_gzugs
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi 'dod chags
[\[73a.2\]]dang bral ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing dbang po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa rnams dang ldan te/_nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro
[\[73a.3\]]log par ltung ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_bdag nyid la stod [#]par mi byed/_gzhan la smod par mi byed de/_de dag dbang po yongs su dag pa de rnams dang ldan pas skye bo mang po byams shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems
[\[73a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mthong ba de dag kyang sems rab tu dang ba de nyid kyis [#]theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par
[\[73a.5\]]bya'o/_/ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/_de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis
[\[73a.6\]]bdag la mi stod [#]cing gzhan la mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
[\[73a.7\]]ma thob kyi bar du nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su mi skye ba dag yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gtong ba dag yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/_sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin te/_de dag nyid dge
[\[73b.2\]]ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rab tu dgod pa dag yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya phrag du ma yongs su bzung /_'khor los sgyur
[\[73b.3\]]ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong phrag du ma yongs su bzung ste/_de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod par byed cing /_de'i 'og tu bla na
[\[73b.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi thob pa dang /_
[\[73b.5\]]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par
[\[73b.6\]]'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas
[\[73b.7\]]'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de
[\[74a.2\]]las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par
[\[74a.3\]]'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang
[\[74a.4\]]dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pas thod rgal la yang snyoms par 'jug pa [#]nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni lus kyi mngon sum du byed pa'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
[\[74a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba byed cing bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang bral bar mi byed
[\[74a.6\]]pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas mi bzhugs shing nyan thos rnams kyang med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do/_/de dag thabs
[\[74a.7\]]la mkhas pas srog chags brgya stong bye ba phrag mang po theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dran pa nye bar
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag thob pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams thob pa
[\[74b.2\]]dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can thams
[\[74b.3\]]cad lam la btsud cing rnam par sbyangs nas/_sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag yod de/_
[\[74b.4\]]bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ma byas pa [#]gzhan de la rab tu dgod par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu rnams yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes dang /_spong
[\[74b.5\]]ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin te zhes bya ba ni rang gis ma thob pa'i chos la gzhan 'god pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta
[\[74b.6\]]bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[74b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skal ba [#]bzang po par shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa 'di gang la yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_kha na ma [#]tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go skabs [#]mi dbye'o zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
[\[75a.2\]]dpa'i dge 'dun gsal bar bstan to/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog la gdams pa'o/_/[#]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi
[\[75a.3\]]las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la
[\[75a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang gi [#]lus kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i lus de ni gang yin/_gang gi [#]ngag gi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i ngag de ni gang yin/_gang gi [#]yid kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i yid de ni gang yin snyam pa 'di ni/_shA ri'i
[\[75a.5\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom [#]pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus gang dang /_ngag gang dang /_yid gang gis ser
[\[75a.6\]]sna dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_le lo dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems skyed [#]par byed pa'i lus mi dmigs so/_/ngag mi dmigs so/_/yid mi dmigs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[75a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len bskyed pa gang [#]yin pa 'di ni gnas med cing go skabs med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi gnas
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ngan len sbyong bar byed/_ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len
[\[75b.2\]]sbyong ba dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang /_ngag mi dmigs pa dang /_sems mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[75b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas
[\[75b.4\]]shing /_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar 'jog pa de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len
[\[75b.5\]]yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_
[\[75b.6\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_bsam gtan gyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed pa dag yod do/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub
[\[75b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam lus mi dmigs pa dang /_ngag mi dmigs pa dang /_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]yid mi dmigs pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]mi dmigs pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [#]mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[76a.2\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /_nyan thos mi dmigs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[76a.3\]]dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 'dis 'gro zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams la spyod pa ni thub par mi nus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ma zhen
[\[76a.4\]]pa la gdams pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams gzhan thams cad kyis thub pa ma mchis pa lags[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[76a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug [#]la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs su mi rlom pa dang /_tshor bar mi rlom pa dang /_'du shes su mi rlom pa dang /_'du byed rnams su mi rlom pa dang /_rnam par shes par mi rlom pa dang /_sa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_chu'i khams
[\[76a.6\]]su mi rlom pa dang /_me'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_rlung gi khams su mi rlom pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_mig gi khams su mi rlom pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
[\[76a.7\]]khams su mi rlom pa dang /_rna ba'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_sgra'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_sna'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_dri'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_lce'i khams su
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]mi rlom pa dang /_ro'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_lus kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang /_reg bya'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_yid kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang /_chos kyi
[\[76b.2\]]khams su mi rlom pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag par mi rlom pa dang /_yang dag par spong bar mi rlom pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par mi rlom pa dang /_dbang por mi rlom pa dang /_stobs su mi rlom pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan
[\[76b.3\]]lag tu mi rlom pa dang /_lam du mi rlom pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[76b.4\]]par mi rlom pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang /_mi 'jigs par mi rlom pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi rlom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rlom pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang /_lan
[\[76b.5\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang /_rang byang chub tu mi rlom pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rlom pa med pa de
[\[76b.6\]]lta [#]na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel te/_sus kyang thub pa med pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
[\[76b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_ye shes de dang ldan pas ngan song thams cad kyi sgo bcad par 'gyur ba dang /_mi dbul zhing phongs [#]pa yang nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi ngal bar gdams pa'o/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams
[\[77a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes gang dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
[\[77a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/de dag gis [#]chos bstan pa yang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_
[\[77a.4\]]byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
[\[77a.5\]]mthong ngo /_/de dag gis [#]chos bstan pa yang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la yang bsnyen bkur byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs
[\[77a.6\]]rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do/_/nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/
[\[77a.7\]]ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed de/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/_/ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom
[\[77b.2\]]par byed de/_dran pa nye bar gzhag [#]pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam [#]sgom par byed de/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[77b.3\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam du dmigs pa yang med do/_/stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub par byed la/_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su
[\[77b.4\]]dmigs pa yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/_ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang [#]yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yang
[\[77b.5\]]rlom pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lam yongs su 'dzin pa la gdams pa'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mig lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongs su sbyong ba yod do/_/mig gang lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongs su sbyong zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha'i mig dang /_
[\[77b.6\]]lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig go/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu
[\[77b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang /_sum brgya dang /_bzhi brgya dang /_lnga brgya dang /_stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do/_/
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig [#]gis gling gnyis dang /_gling gsum dang /_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
[\[78a.2\]]gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/shA'i [#]mig gang gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha'i mig gang gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i [#]mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
[\[78a.3\]]rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom
[\[78a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'thab bral gyi lha rnams
[\[78a.5\]]kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
[\[78a.6\]]kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes
[\[78a.7\]]so/_/tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'od chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/dge chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin
[\[78b.2\]]pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi
[\[78b.3\]]lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'du shes
[\[78b.4\]]med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
[\[78b.5\]]rab tu shes so/_/legs mthong gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/rab lta'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
[\[78b.6\]]rab tu shes so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'phrul
[\[78b.7\]]dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/tshangs 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/tshangs chen gyi [#]lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'od chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/dge chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/
[\[79a.2\]]sprin med kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/legs
[\[79a.3\]]mthong gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/rab lta'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de dag nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag
[\[79a.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis nub
[\[79a.5\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad
[\[79a.6\]]kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[79a.7\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba [#]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba
[\[79b.2\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [#]lha'i
[\[79b.3\]]mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[79b.4\]]shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/_nyon
[\[79b.5\]]mongs pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yang rung ste/_chos gang yang rab tu mi shes pa med pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang ma
[\[79b.6\]]mthong ma thos/_ma bsams khong du ma chud pa med pa ni/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa
[\[79b.7\]]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gi gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/_gang
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye
[\[80a.2\]]shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs bsnyems [#]pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag [#]'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom [#]pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_
[\[80a.3\]]gnod sems rab tu bsrabs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/de bsgom [#]pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis [#]'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems rab tu spangs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/de bsgom [#]pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de
[\[80a.4\]]nyid kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_/gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa rab tu spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/_gang zag 'di'i [#]dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar
[\[80a.5\]]pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba [#]skye bar 'gyur ba nas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o/_/[#]gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas
[\[80a.6\]]pa ste/_'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[80a.7\]]chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes te/_gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dbang po lnga 'thob ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu shes te/_gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi
[\[80b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa yin te/_de ni de'i lam dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob ste/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa de ni bsams bzhin du bdag gi lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di
[\[80b.3\]]ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa yin te/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
[\[80b.4\]]rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su
[\[80b.5\]]skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni 'og min gyi bar du skye bar 'gyur te/_de der gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[80b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_bkur stir byed par 'gyur/_bla mar byed par 'gyur/_ri mor byed par 'gyur/_mchod par byed par 'gyur[#]/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo /_/byang chub sems
[\[80b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[81a.2\]]'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa [#]yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[81a.3\]]'di dag ni [#]mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin
[\[81a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_rjed par byed/_mchod par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas mchod pa'i bar du mi byed do/_/'dis ni mngon par shes
[\[81a.5\]]pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur
[\[81a.6\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do/_/
[\[81a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni bsngags pa brjod [#]par mi mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur
[\[81b.2\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[81b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[81b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o[#]/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug
[\[81b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur te[#]/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab
[\[81b.6\]]tu shes te/_de ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[81b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/_sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa gang yin pa de ni
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_mig gang
[\[82a.2\]]gis [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am/_ma thos pa'am/_ma bsams pa'am/_rnam par ma shes pa ci yang med pa ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[82a.3\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par [#]sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir
[\[82a.4\]]zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/_/shA ri'i bu gang zhig dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus
