[\[102a.6\]]yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya
[\[102a.7\]]bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi
[\[102b.2\]]khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba zhes
[\[102b.3\]]bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag pa zhes bya ba'am/_mi 'gag pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
[\[102b.4\]]khams dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dge zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge [#]zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi
[\[102b.5\]]khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya
[\[102b.6\]]ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid
[\[102b.7\]]kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kun nas nyon
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi [#]
[\[103a.2\]]mi mthong ngo /_/mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
[\[103a.3\]]su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/stong
[\[103a.4\]]zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus byas zhes
[\[103a.5\]]bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/skye ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag ces bya ba'am/_mi 'gag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben
[\[103a.6\]]zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dge ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya
[\[103a.7\]]ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi [#]
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal
[\[103b.2\]]ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba dang sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang [#]yin
[\[103b.3\]]pa de yang rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zhi zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[103b.4\]]ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar
[\[103b.5\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/skye ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag pa zhes bya ba'am/_mi 'gag pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su
[\[103b.6\]]mi mthong ngo /_/dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dge zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[103b.7\]]zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma
[\[104a.2\]]yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i [#]reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma
[\[104a.3\]]yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang rtag ces [#]bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar
[\[104a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[104a.5\]]smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/skye ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag pa zhes
[\[104a.6\]]bya ba'am/_mi 'gag pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dge ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge ba zhes bya bar yang dag par [#]rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[104a.7\]]kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis
[\[104b.2\]]byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen
[\[104b.3\]]gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang
[\[104b.4\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[104b.5\]]mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/skye ba [#]
[\[104b.6\]]zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba [#]zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag ces bya ba 'am/_mi 'gag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dge ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge ba
[\[104b.7\]]zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya
[\[105a.2\]]bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya
[\[105a.3\]]bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya
[\[105a.4\]]bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su
[\[105a.5\]]mi mthong ngo /_/stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus
[\[105a.6\]]byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/skye ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag pa zhes bya ba'am/_mi 'gag pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes
[\[105a.7\]]bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dge ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa med
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon
[\[105b.2\]]mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde [#]ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang
[\[105b.3\]]yin pa de yang 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma
[\[105b.4\]]yin pa gang yin pa de yang rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[105b.5\]]zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_
[\[105b.6\]]smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/skye ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag pa zhes bya ba'am/_mi 'gag pa zhes bya
[\[105b.7\]]bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dge ba zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
[\[106a.2\]]ngo /_/'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid dang chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i reg pa'i
[\[106a.3\]]rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]
[\[106a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming de 'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams
[\[106a.5\]]su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/de rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos la gnas nas dran pa nye bar gzhag
[\[106a.6\]]pa rnams sgom par byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[106a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_pha rol tu
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]phyin pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom par byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang [#]dag
[\[106b.2\]]par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'o/_/[#]de ci'i
[\[106b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs pa yin te/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/_rab
[\[106b.4\]]'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ming gi brda dang ldan pa'i chos rnams rtag [#]par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]des ming gi brda dang ldan pa'i chos su btags par khong du [#]chud pas
[\[106b.5\]]gzugs la chags pa med do/_/[#]tshor ba la chags pa med do/_/'du shes la chags pa med do/_/'du byed rnams la chags pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/_/mig la mngon par chags pa med do/_/gzugs la mngon par chags pa med do/_/mig gi rnam par
[\[106b.6\]]shes pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/mig dang gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin
[\[106b.7\]]pa gang yin pa de la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/rna ba la mngon par chags pa med do/_/sgra la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rna ba dang sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa [#]de la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/sna la mngon par chags pa med do/_/dri la mngon par chags
[\[107a.2\]]pa med do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug
[\[107a.3\]]bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa [#]de la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/lce la mngon par chags pa med do/_/ro la mngon par chags pa med do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/lce dang /_
[\[107a.4\]]ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/lus la mngon par chags pa med do/_/reg bya la
[\[107a.5\]]mngon par chags pa med do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/lus dang reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_
[\[107a.6\]]bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/yid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/chos la mngon par chags pa med do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
[\[107a.7\]]mngon par chags pa med do/_/yid dang chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/'dus
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]byas kyi khams la mngon par chags pa med do/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams la mngon par chags pa med do zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'o/_/[#]de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med
[\[107b.2\]]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/
[\[107b.3\]]de dag ni ming dang mtshan nyid la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/lus la mngon par chags pa med do/_/sha'i mig la mngon par chags pa med do/_/lha'i mig la mngon par chags pa med do/_/shes rab kyi mig la mngon par chags pa med do/_/chos kyi mig la
[\[107b.4\]]mngon par chags pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi mig la mngon par chags pa med do/_/mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med do/_/nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/phyi nang stong
[\[107b.5\]]pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma
[\[107b.6\]]med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i
[\[107b.7\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi dngos po stong pa nyid dang /_gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/de bzhin nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' la mngon par chags pa med do/_/chos kyi dbyings la mngon par chags pa
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]med do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par chags pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la mngon par chags pa med do/_/thabs la mkhas pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang chags
[\[108a.2\]]par byed pa'am/_gang gis chags par bya ba'am/_gang la chags par bya ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
[\[108a.3\]]chos thams cad la mngon par ma zhen pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/[#]bsam gtan gyi
[\[108a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[108a.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[108a.6\]]mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bkur stir [#]byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa
[\[108a.7\]]ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur zhing chos kyang nyan par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang byang chub kyi snying po ji srid par 'di'i chos rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang thob
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ming gi brda dang ldan pa'i chos su btags pa rnams khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
[\[108b.2\]]sems dpa' zhes gang brjod pa de la ji snyam du sems/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_'du shes byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_'du byed rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rnam par shes
[\[108b.3\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_tshor ba las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_'du shes las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[108b.4\]]'du byed rnams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de [#]ji snyam du sems/_gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod
[\[108b.5\]]snyam mam/_'du shes la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_'du byed rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs yod snyam mam/_
[\[108b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba yod snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du shes yod snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed rnams yod snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa yod snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs med
[\[108b.7\]]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_tshor ba med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_'du shes med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_'du byed rnams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rnam par shes pa med pa zhig byang
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ci [#]snyam du sems/_mig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam[#]/_mig las gzhan
[\[109a.2\]]zhig yin snyam mam/_mig la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la mig yod pa'am/_mig med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rna ba las gzhan zhig
[\[109a.3\]]yin pa'am/_rna ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba yod pa'am/_rna ba med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_sna las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_sna
[\[109a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la sna yod pa'am/_sna med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_lce las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_lce la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems
[\[109a.5\]]dpa' la lce yod pa'am/_lce med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_lus las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_lus la byang chub sems dpa' yod
[\[109a.6\]]pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la lus yod pa'am/_lus pa [#]med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_yid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_yid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_
[\[109a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' la yid yod pa'am/_yid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa'
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]yin pa'am/_gzugs las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs yod pa'am/_gzugs med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra byang chub sems dpa'
[\[109b.2\]]yin pa'am/_sgra las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_sgra la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la sgra yod pa'am/_sgra med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_dri las gzhan zhig
[\[109b.3\]]yin pa'am/_dri la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la dri yod pa'am/_dri med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de [#]ji snyam du sems/_ro byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_ro las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_ro la byang chub
[\[109b.4\]]sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la ro yod pa'am/_ro med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de [#]ji snyam du sems/_reg byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_reg las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_reg la byang chub sems dpa' yod
[\[109b.5\]]pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg yod pa'am/_reg med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_chos las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_chos la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_
[\[109b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' la chos yod pa'am/_chos med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig dang /_gzugs
[\[109b.7\]]dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_de rnams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de rnams la de yod pa'am/_de la de rnams yod pa'am/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_de rnams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de rnams la de yod pa'am/_de la de rnams [#]
[\[110a.2\]]yod pa'am/_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_de rnams las gzhan zhig
[\[110a.3\]]yin pa'am/_de rnams la de yod pa'am/_de la de rnams yod pa'am/_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub
[\[110a.4\]]sems dpa' yin pa'am/_de rnams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de rnams la de yod pa'am/_de la de rnams [#]yod pa'am/_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus
[\[110a.5\]]dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_de rnams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de rnams la de yod pa'am/_de la de rnams yod pa'am/_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems
[\[110a.6\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_de rnams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de rnams la de yod pa'am/_de la de rnams yod pa'am/_yid dang /_chos
[\[110a.7\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams byang chub sems
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]dpa' yin pa'am/_sa'i khams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams yod pa'am/_sa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams
[\[110b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_chu'i khams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la chu'i khams yod pa'am/_chu'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_me'i
[\[110b.3\]]khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_me'i khams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la me'i khams yod pa'am/_me'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[110b.4\]]rlung gi khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am[#]/_rlung gi khams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams yod pa'am/_rlung gi khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor
[\[110b.5\]]de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_nam mkha'i khams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams yod pa'am/_nam mkha'i khams med pa zhig byang chub
[\[110b.6\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams
[\[110b.7\]]yod pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' yin
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa'am/_ma rig pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_ma rig pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa yod pa'am/_ma rig pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du
[\[111a.2\]]byed rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_'du byed rnams las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_'du byed rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed rnams yod pa'am/_'du byed rnams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[111a.3\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa yod pa'am/_rnam par shes pa med
[\[111a.4\]]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ming dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_ming dang gzugs las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_ming dang gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la ming
[\[111a.5\]]dang gzugs yod pa'am/_ming dang gzugs med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_skye mched drug las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_skye mched drug la byang chub sems dpa' yod
[\[111a.6\]]pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug yod pa'am/_skye mched drug med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_reg pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_reg pa la byang chub sems
[\[111a.7\]]dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa yod pa'am/_reg pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_tshor ba las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba yod pa'am/_tshor ba med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_sred pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_sred pa la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[111b.2\]]yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la sred pa yod pa'am/_sred pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_len pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_len pa la byang chub
[\[111b.3\]]sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la len pa yod pa'am/_len pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_srid pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_
[\[111b.4\]]srid pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa yod pa'am/_srid pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_skye ba las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_
[\[111b.5\]]skye ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba yod pa'am/_skye ba med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rga shi las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_rga shi la
[\[111b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi yod pa'am/_rga shi med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]
[\[111b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ci gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa'
[\[112a.2\]]yin pa'am/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab
[\[112a.3\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du shes kyi de bzhin
[\[112a.4\]]nyid yod pa'am/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_'du
[\[112a.5\]]byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
[\[112a.6\]]nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i de
[\[112a.7\]]bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gal te phung po so so ba la byang chub sems dpa' med na tshogs pa la yod pa
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]yin te/_phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_phung po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_phung po'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la phung po'i de bzhin nyid [#]yod pa'am/_phung po'i de
[\[112b.2\]]bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
[\[112b.3\]]yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems
[\[112b.4\]]dpa' la mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de
[\[112b.5\]]bzhin nyid dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
[\[112b.6\]]nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid dang /_chos
[\[112b.7\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_
[\[113a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_chu'i khams kyi de
[\[113a.3\]]bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam
[\[113a.4\]]du sems/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la me'i khams kyi de bzhin
[\[113a.5\]]nyid yod pa'am/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin
[\[113a.6\]]pa'am/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam
[\[113a.7\]]mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams kyi de
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
[\[113b.2\]]las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin
[\[113b.3\]]snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gal te khams [#]so so la byang chub sems dpa' med na/_tshogs pa rnams la yod pa yin te/_khams kyi de bzhin nyid
[\[113b.4\]]gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang
[\[113b.5\]]chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_mig gi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig
[\[113b.6\]]yin pa'am/_mig gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_mig gi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_sna'i de bzhin nyid dang /_lce'i de
[\[113b.7\]]bzhin nyid dang /_lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa yang de bzhin te/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[114a.2\]]de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod
[\[114a.3\]]pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_
[\[114a.4\]]sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i de bzhin nyid rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
[\[114a.5\]]mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_
[\[114a.6\]]chos kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te skye mched rnams so so la byang chub sems dpa' med na tshogs pa la yod par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor
[\[114a.7\]]de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_ma
[\[114b.2\]]rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_'du byed kyi de
[\[114b.3\]]bzhin nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid dang /_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_len pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[114b.4\]]skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las [#]gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub
[\[114b.5\]]sems dpa' la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gal te rten cing 'brel
[\[114b.6\]]par 'byung ba so so ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' med na tshogs pa rnams la yod pa yin te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig yin pa'am/_rten cing 'brel
[\[114b.7\]]par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong nas 'di skad du gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/_/tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes ma yin/_'du byed rnams ma yin/_rnam par shes pa ma
[\[115a.2\]]yin no/_/mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/_rna ba dang sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/_sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/_lus dang
[\[115a.3\]]reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/_yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/sa'i khams ma yin/_chu'i khams ma yin/_me'i khams ma yin/_rlung gi khams ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin
[\[115a.4\]]no/_/mig ma yin/_rna ba ma yin/_sna ma yin/_lce ma yin/_lus ma yin/_yid ma yin/_gzugs ma yin/_sgra ma yin/_dri ma yin/_ro ma yin/_reg bya ma yin/_chos ma yin no/_/ma rig pa ma yin te/_de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang
[\[115a.5\]]gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi rnams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' ma yin te/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_'du shes kyi
[\[115a.6\]]de bzhin nyid ma yin/_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/_/mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin te/_rna ba dang sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_sna dang
[\[115a.7\]]dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid [#]ma yin/_lce dang ro dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin no/_/sa'i khams kyi de
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]bzhin nyid ma yin te[#]/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin no/_/mig gi de bzhin nyid ma yin te/_rna ba'i
[\[115b.2\]]de bzhin nyid ma yin/_sna'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_lce'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_dri'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_ro'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_reg bya'i de bzhin nyid ma
[\[115b.3\]]yin/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin no/_/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin te/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_tshor ba'i
[\[115b.4\]]de bzhin nyid ma yin/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin[#]/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa nas/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid
[\[115b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no[#]//_//bam po brgyad pa/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na gzugs byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes
[\[115b.6\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba [#]lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na mig dang gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa rnams byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
[\[115b.7\]]ga la mchis/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_lce dang ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_yid dang chos dang yid
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]kyi rnam par shes pa rnams byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na sa'i khams byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du
[\[116a.2\]]chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na mig byang chub sems
[\[116a.3\]]dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na gzugs byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
[\[116a.4\]]lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang chos byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na ma rig pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_
[\[116a.5\]]de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi [#]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub
[\[116a.6\]]sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na gzugs 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa 'di'i de bzhin
[\[116a.7\]]nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]shes pa rnams dang /_lce dang ro dang lce'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin
[\[116b.2\]]tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na sa'i khams 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga
[\[116b.3\]]la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na mig gi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_de bzhin du rna ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_sna'i de bzhin nyid dang /_lce'i de bzhin nyid dang /_lus kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[116b.4\]]yid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na gzugs 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang [#]ga la 'gyur/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos
[\[116b.5\]]'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na ma rig pa 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs
[\[116b.6\]]dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi 'di'i [#]de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung
[\[116b.7\]]ba so so re re ba rnams dang /_bsdus pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_des na phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched 'di'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor de ji
[\[117a.2\]]snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_
[\[117a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs rtag pa'am/_gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
[\[117a.4\]]ba 'di gzugs bde ba'am/_gzugs sdug bsngal ba'am/_gzugs bdag yod pa'am/_gzugs bdag med pa'am/_gzugs zhi ba'am/_gzugs ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor
[\[117a.5\]]ba rtag pa'am/_tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba bde ba'am/_tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'am/_tshor ba bdag yod pa'am/_tshor ba bdag med pa'am/_tshor ba zhi ba'am/_tshor ba ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas yin
[\[117a.6\]]snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes rtag pa'am/_'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes bde ba'am/_'du shes sdug bsngal ba'am/_'du shes bdag
[\[117a.7\]]yod pa'am/_'du shes bdag med pa'am/_'du shes zhi ba'am/_'du shes ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed rnams rtag pa rnams sam/_'du byed rnams mi rtag pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]yin snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed rnams bde ba rnams sam/_'du byed rnams sdug bsngal ba rnams sam/_'du byed rnams bdag yod pa rnams sam/_'du byed rnams bdag med pa rnams sam/_'du byed rnams zhi ba rnams sam/_'du byed rnams
[\[117b.2\]]ma zhi ba rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa bde
[\[117b.3\]]ba'am/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'am/_rnam par shes pa bdag yod pa'am/_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'am/_rnam par shes pa zhi ba'am/_rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[117b.4\]]zhes bya ba 'di gzugs stong pa'am/_gzugs mi stong pa'am/_gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'am/_gzugs mtshan ma med pa'am/_gzugs smon pa yod pa'am/_gzugs smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams
[\[117b.5\]]la de bzhin te/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa stong pa'am/_rnam par shes pa mi stong pa'am/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'am/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'am/_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'am/_rnam
[\[117b.6\]]par shes pa smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong nas 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di
[\[117b.7\]]gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas ma yin zhing de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]tshig bla dgas ma yin/_de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla
[\[118a.2\]]dgas ma yin/_stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin te/_gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_byang chub
[\[118a.3\]]sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_
[\[118a.4\]]zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_tshor ba smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_
[\[118a.5\]]smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas
[\[118a.6\]]ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas
[\[118a.7\]]ma yin/_'du shes smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig bla
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dgas ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_
[\[118b.2\]]mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_'du byed rnams smon pa yod [#]pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla [#]dgas ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi rtag
[\[118b.3\]]pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_stong pa'i
[\[118b.4\]]tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin zhes zer/_rab 'byor gyis
[\[118b.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das tshor ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba'i tshig bla
[\[118b.6\]]dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 'du shes shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_
[\[118b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed rnams kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig bla
[\[119a.2\]]dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags so/_/zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas
[\[119a.3\]]ma lags/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_smon
[\[119a.4\]]pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba ma lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_
[\[119a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_sdug bsngal gyi tshig bla
[\[119a.6\]]dgas ma lags/_bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_mtshan ma yod pa'i
[\[119a.7\]]tshig bla dgas ma lags/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma lags/_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_tshor ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_'du shes kyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_'du byed rnams kyi tshig bla dgas mi
[\[119b.2\]]dmigs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi
[\[119b.3\]]dmigs pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi
[\[119b.4\]]dmigs pa dang /_tshor ba rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas mi
[\[119b.5\]]dmigs pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_'du shes rtag pa dang /_mi rtag
[\[119b.6\]]pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa'i tshig
[\[119b.7\]]bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang [#]/_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_'du byed rnams rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_mtshan
[\[120a.2\]]ma yod pa dang [#]/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas
[\[120a.3\]]mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi
[\[120a.4\]]dmigs pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du bdag gis chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_'di
[\[120a.5\]]lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor chos kyis [#]chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor gzugs kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings
[\[120a.6\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor tshor ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang tshor ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[120a.7\]]rab 'byor 'du shes kyi dbyings kyis [#]chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang 'du shes kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor 'du byed rnams kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]kyis kyang 'du byed rnams kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor mig gi dbyings
[\[120b.2\]]kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rna ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[120b.3\]]sna'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang sna'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lce'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang lce'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su
[\[120b.4\]]mi mthong ngo /_/lus kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang lus kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi
[\[120b.5\]]dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi [#]dbyings kyis 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo
[\[120b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'o/_/'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa'o/_/[#]rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi dbyings med par 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su gdags par mi nus/_'dus ma byas kyi dbyings med par yang 'dus byas kyi dbyings su gdags par mi nus
[\[120b.7\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yang dag par rjes su ma [#]mthong bas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing /_de'i
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]sems chos gang la yang zhum par mi 'gyur yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi
[\[121a.2\]]mthong ngo [#]/_/'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/'du byed rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba yang dag
[\[121a.3\]]par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/sna yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/yid yang [#]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[121a.4\]]dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam
[\[121a.5\]]mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ma rig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_
[\[121a.6\]]srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dod chags yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/zhe sdang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sems can dang /_srog
[\[121a.7\]]dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyan thos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/rang sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nyan thos kyi chos yang
[\[121b.2\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/byang chub yang dag par
[\[121b.3\]]rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin
[\[121b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba'i
[\[121b.5\]]chos mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur[#]/_kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid dngang bar
[\[121b.6\]]mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid dang yid kyi khams mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid
[\[121b.7\]]dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos [#]thams cad mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par byas te/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' de yang mi dmigs[#]/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' [#]de yang mi dmigs shing yang dag par [#]rjes su mi mthong na/_'di nyid byang chub
[\[122a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gdams ngag yin te/_'di nyid rjes su bstan pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[122a.3\]]chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du shes yongs su
[\[122a.4\]]shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
[\[122a.5\]]par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[122a.6\]]dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sna yongs su shes par
[\[122a.7\]]'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lce yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]ldan 'das lus yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yid yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[122b.2\]]bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sgra yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[122b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dri yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ro yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[122b.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das reg yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos yongs su shes par
[\[122b.5\]]'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/
