[\[147a.7\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus
[\[147b.2\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni
[\[147b.3\]]ji lta bu/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rab 'byor gyis [#]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/'du byed rnams kyi
[\[147b.4\]]rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i so so ba dang bsdus pa'i [#]rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshe
[\[147b.5\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_khyod kyis 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /_tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /_'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang [#]/_'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
[\[147b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /_skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /_khams rnams ni khams [#]kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba
[\[147b.7\]]dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/tshor ba ni tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/'du shes ni 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang bral
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]ba'o/_/'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/khams rnams ni khams rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang
[\[148a.2\]]bral ba'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bar ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo dang bral ba'o/_/ngo bo yang ngo bo'i mtshan
[\[148a.3\]]nyid dang bral ba'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_
[\[148a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no/_/[#]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams
[\[148a.5\]]cad ni ma skyes shing nges par ma byung ba'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyu gang gis na chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par ma 'byung ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la skye ba'am/_nges par
[\[148a.6\]]'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs
[\[148a.7\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]so/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[148b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/_de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[148b.3\]]sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba [#]de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[148b.4\]]dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed [#]do/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed [#]do/_/nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang /_phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[148b.5\]]sred pa dang ldan pa dang /_lta ba ngan pa [#]dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_g.yo dang /_sgyu dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_sred pa dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed
[\[148b.6\]]pas nam yang ma'i [#]mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rdzus [#]te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs
[\[148b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang [#]bsnyen bkur byed/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang sbyong bar byed de nas [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dang 'bral [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar [#]spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod pa 'bring gi dmigs

[\[149a.3\]]mtshan ma la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/'du byed rnams la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[149a.6\]]ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/'du [#]shes bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/

[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/tshor ba bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/'du shes bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/'du byed rnams bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar

[\[149b.6\]]spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/_

[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal

[\[150a.6\]]dang /_lhag par mos pa dang /_kun shes pa dang /_'du shes la gnas pa dang /_lhag par mos pa dang /_kun shes pa dang /_'du byed rnams la gnas pa dang /_lhag par mos pa dang /_kun shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa dang /_lhag par mos pa dang /_kun shes

[\[150b\]]

[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba dang [#]/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa

[\[151a.4\]]pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas pa dang /_lhag par mos pa dang /_kun shes na de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas pa dang /_lhag par mos pa dang /_kun shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
[\[151a.5\]]mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/_mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pas skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags [#]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi

[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang /_lhag par mos pa med pa dang /_kun shes pa

[\[151b.3\]]kun shes pa med pas de gzugs la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/_gzugs
[\[151b.4\]]rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang /_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /_zhi
[\[151b.5\]]ba'am/_ma zhi ba [#]zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin te/_rnam par shes pa bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal [#]zhes bya ba dang /_bdag gam bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /_zhi ba'am ma zhi ba [#]zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs stong pa'am/_mi stong
[\[151b.6\]]pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mtshan ma yod pa'am/_mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_smon pa yod pa'am/_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la de bzhin te/_rnam par shes pa stong pa'am/_mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mtshan ma yod
[\[151b.7\]]pa'am/_mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_smon pa yod pa'am/_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_dben pa'am/_mi dben pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gzhan na [#]gzugs med/_gzugs las gzhan na [#]stong pa nyid med de/_gzugs nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed

[\[152a.3\]]du skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[152a.4\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/_sangs rgyas
[\[152a.5\]]kyi chos rnams las gzhan na yang stong pa nyid med de/_stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs
[\[152a.6\]]mkhas par shes par bya'o//_//bam po bcu gcig pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do/_/
[\[152a.7\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gal te chos 'ga' zhig nye bar rtogs na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/nye bar rtogs pa yang ma [#]yin la/_nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na/_shes rab kyi
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la/_nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[152b.2\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nye bar rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/_nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/_nye bar rtogs pa yang ma [#]yin la/_nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/_nye
[\[152b.3\]]bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe [#]na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[152b.4\]]tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so/_/mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so/_/spyod kyang spyod la mi
[\[152b.5\]]spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so/_/spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar shes
[\[152b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum zhing kun tu mi zhum ste/_mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par ma gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar rig par bya'o
[\[152b.7\]]zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing [#]gnyis su byar med pa'o/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]'dzin ni [#]chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de/_yangs pa/_mdun du byas pa/_tshad med par nges pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin [#]des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[153a.2\]]dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin ni [#]gang dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[153a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
[\[153a.4\]]bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod do/_/de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
[\[153a.5\]]yod do/_/zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos
[\[153a.6\]]kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mnyam par gzhag [#]pa'i gnas
[\[153a.7\]]skabs su rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/stobs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad las yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin la
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug
[\[153b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/lta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
[\[153b.3\]]yod do/_/nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nam mkha' ltar rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
[\[153b.4\]]do/_/rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
[\[153b.5\]]yod do/_/nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas la rten [#]pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[153b.6\]]dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od dri ma med pa zhes
[\[153b.7\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rgyal bar bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]'dzin yod do/_/gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'jigs pa [#]med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
[\[154a.2\]]'dzin yod do/_/nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/bya ba byed
[\[154a.3\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rin
[\[154a.4\]]chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos kyis [#]'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya
[\[154a.5\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yi ge rnam [#]par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
[\[154a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/g.yo
[\[154a.7\]]ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/g.yul [#]las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yongs su gcod par byed [#]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
[\[154b.2\]]yod do/_/nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[154b.3\]]rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/brda dang /_sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
[\[154b.4\]]yod do/_/sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal thams
[\[154b.5\]]cad la mngon par mi dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'jig rten thams cad rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting
[\[154b.6\]]nge 'dzin yod do/_/tshul dang tshul med pa las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rjes su 'brang ba thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gzhi med par nges pa [#]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
[\[154b.7\]]do/_/lus kyi skyon yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos [#]pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/_ting
[\[155a.2\]]nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs [#]pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur
[\[155a.3\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de[#]/_de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/_
[\[155a.4\]]de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas gdab [#]par 'gyur ba ste/_de ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa
[\[155a.5\]]med pa'i [#]rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyi [#]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol bas gos pa med pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ste/_de ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas [#]rnam par grol zhing
[\[155a.6\]]gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no/_/[#]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[155a.7\]]dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gi [#]gnas pa [#]ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te/_des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar
[\[155b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do/_/des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/_/bdag gis mnyam par gzhag [#]par bya'o/_/bdag ni mnyam par gzhag [#]par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/_de la rnam par
[\[155b.3\]]rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi [#]mchog 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[155b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]lung bstan pa yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin yang gzhan/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba
[\[155b.5\]]med kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te/_ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med[#]/_
[\[155b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/_ting nge 'dzin nyid [#]kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/_de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[155b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do/_/smras pa/_ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]smras pa/_ji ltar rnam par rtog [#]pa med pa ltar ro/_/smras pa de la ji ltar rtog [#]pa med pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/_de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rigs
[\[156a.2\]]kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/_/'du shes su byed pa med do/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing /_'du shes su 'gyur ba med/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_ting nge 'dzin de yang med la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir/_
[\[156a.3\]]rnam par shes pa med do/_/'du shes su 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no/_/[#]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_ji ltar khyod nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan
[\[156a.4\]]pa ltar ston pa ni legs so/_/legs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi
[\[156a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar
[\[156a.6\]]slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob [#]pa lags sam/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa
[\[156a.7\]]lags sam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]gyis slob pa yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam
[\[156b.2\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /[#]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
[\[156b.3\]]ri'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[156b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi
[\[156b.5\]]dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs
[\[156b.6\]]so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_gzugs med pa'i
[\[156b.7\]]khams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_dran pa nye bar gzhag [#]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[157a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong
[\[157a.3\]]ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_byang chub mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom
[\[157a.4\]]ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[157a.5\]]dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa spyi'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin no/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/_
[\[157a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni/_byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin no/_/
[\[157a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa ji ltar mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/_de ltar yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir med ces bya'o zhes [#]bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dang po ma rig pa'i rtog pa
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]yin no/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa [#]ma lags pas [#]ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du
[\[157b.2\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/
[\[157b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la rtog pa yin no/_/[#]de la byis pa so so'i [#]skye bo rnams [#]ni ma rig pa dang /_
[\[157b.4\]]sred pa la [#]mngon par zhen to/_/de dag gis ni ma rig pa dang /_sred pas brtags so/_/brtags nas ma rig pa dang /_sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen te/_mtha' gnyis su chags pas de dag gis mtha' gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de dag gis [#]ji lta ba bzhin med pa'i
[\[157b.5\]]chos de dag brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen par gyur to zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa'i rtog pa yin no/_/[#]chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa de dag ni med pa'i mtha' gnyis
[\[157b.6\]]dag tu rtog par byed/_brtags nas mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/_gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ba nas/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung
[\[157b.7\]]ba'i bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ste/_de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa mtha' gnyis la chags
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]de dag ni ma rig pa dang /_sred pa'i rkyen gyis mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/_gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du gzugs rnam par byang ba'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[158a.2\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de dag ni nges par mi [#]'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang nas nges par mi 'byung zhe na/_
[\[158a.3\]]'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dag las nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid
[\[158a.4\]]kyi rtog pa lnga pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [#]mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]de dag ni [#]mi dad do/_/ji ltar mi dad ce na/_gzugs gzugs kyis [#]stong zhes bya bar mi dad do/_/byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis [#]stong zhes bya bar mi dad do/_/de dag ni gnas pa ma
[\[158a.5\]]yin no/_/ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[158a.6\]]la gnas pa ma yin/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/_/de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/_gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[158a.7\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/_mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/_lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/_byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/_de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[158b.2\]]mi slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/_/
[\[158b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhe na[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[158b.4\]]po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[158b.5\]]pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[158b.6\]]pa la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[158b.7\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed pa nas/_chos thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog par byed/_mngon par zhen par byed
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]do/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa 'phags pa'i lam la mi gnas pa'i rnam par
[\[159a.2\]]rtog pa yin no/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar bslabs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu
[\[159a.3\]]nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar slob na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
[\[159a.4\]]par 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mi dmigs/_yang dag par rjes
[\[159a.5\]]su mi mthong ba de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
[\[159a.6\]]pa dang /_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa [#]dmigs pa la rtog pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis [#]rnam pa thams
[\[159a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs shing mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs shing mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba [#]de nyid kyi rtog pa
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]brgyad pa bdag la sogs par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu rnam par dag pa ni skye ba med pa ma byung ba mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa dgu pa rnam par dag pa skye ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]'di dag ni gzung ba'i rtog pa dang po yin no/_/[#]de thabs mi mkhas
[\[159b.2\]]pas gzugs la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/_rnam par shes pa'i bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa dang po [#]phung po'i don la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]mig la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/_de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang gzugs
[\[159b.3\]]la mngon par [#]rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/_de bzhin du chos kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa skye ba'i sgo'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]mig [#]dang gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/_de bzhin du
[\[159b.4\]]yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa rigs kyi don la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]ma rig par rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/_de bzhin du rga shir rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes
[\[159b.5\]]bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa skye ba'i don la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]de nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang [#]/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa stong pa nyid kyi don la rnam par rtog pa yin
[\[159b.6\]]no/_/[#]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni/_de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa mthong ba'i lam la rnam
[\[159b.7\]]par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]de bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog cing /_mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni/_de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa [#]bsgom pa'i lam la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]de bzhin gshegs
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]pa'i stobs bcur rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam la rtog pa yin no/_/[#]'di dag ni gzung ba'i rtog pa gnyis pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu bdag
[\[160a.2\]]nye bar mi dmigs/_de bzhin du sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_rig pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag
[\[160a.3\]]med cing mi dmigs zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa las/_rtog pa dang po bdag rang dbang can la rnam par rtog pa'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bu gzugs nye bar mi dmigs zhes bya ba nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du nye bar mi dmigs zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis
[\[160a.4\]]pa bdag gcig pur rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu mig [#]mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang /_gzugs mi dmigs/_chos kyi bar du mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa rgyu'i bdag nyid la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi
[\[160a.5\]]rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/_/yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa lta ba po la sogs pa'i bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bar du mi
[\[160a.6\]]dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]bsam gtan dang po mi dmigs so/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rten gyi bdag
[\[160a.7\]]tu rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa mthong ba'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa sgom pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]stobs bcu mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/ji ltar mi dmigs she na/_bdag nyid du'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de
[\[160b.2\]]nyid kyi rtog pa dgu pa don byas pa'i rten gyi rnam par rtog pa yin no 'di dag ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab
[\[160b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol
[\[160b.4\]]tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[160b.5\]]rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
[\[160b.6\]]par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta bas na de khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig_/ces bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa phyir bstan pa
[\[160b.7\]]yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta [#]ma lags so
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa rtog pa dang po yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_
[\[161a.2\]]lus dang /_yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de
[\[161a.3\]]ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa skye mched du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_
[\[161a.4\]]rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa [#]dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
[\[161a.5\]]zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te
[\[161a.6\]]reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du
[\[161a.7\]]sems/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
[\[161b.2\]]zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
[\[161b.3\]]lags te/_chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams [#]kyang gzhan ma
[\[161b.4\]]lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/_/
[\[161b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba ni de [#]nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa khams su btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]
[\[161b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_ma rig pa nyid
[\[161b.7\]]kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par shes pa
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan la
[\[162a.2\]]sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/_/bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan la [#]sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
[\[162a.3\]]lags te/_tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_
[\[162a.4\]]sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o/_bcom
[\[162a.5\]]ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o [#]zhes bya ba ni/_de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[162a.6\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa rnam par byang bar btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan
[\[162a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa mthong ba'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[162b.2\]]pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa bsgom [#]pa'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[162b.3\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_stong pa nyid thams cad kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa khyad par gyi lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/[#]
[\[162b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin [#]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[162b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
[\[162b.6\]]te/_gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan
[\[162b.7\]]ma lags te/_'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_'du byed rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma
[\[163a.2\]]lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg
[\[163a.3\]]pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_
[\[163a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[163a.5\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang
[\[163a.6\]]gzhan ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang [#]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[163a.7\]]ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma la skye ba'am/_'gag pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[163b.2\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon
[\[163b.3\]]mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol
[\[163b.4\]]tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la slob par 'gyur ram/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so
[\[163b.5\]]yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la slob par 'gyur ram/_thams cad shes pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang [#]/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[163b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang /_kun shes pa dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[163b.7\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes pa dang /_kun shes pa dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam gyis [#]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]rnam par byang ba dmigs par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la 'du shes med cing kun shes pa med pa dang /_gdags pa med pa dang /_
[\[164a.2\]]tha snyad med pa dang /_ming med pa dang /_ming du gdags pa med pa dang /_lus med pa dang /_lus kyi las med pa dang /_ngag med pa dang /_ngag gi las med pa dang /_yid med pa dang /_yid kyi las med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon
[\[164a.3\]]mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa de/_ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[164a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de
[\[164a.5\]]ltar lags na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par
[\[164a.6\]]bgyi ste/_'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga [#]rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_
[\[164a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu'o/_/rmi lam yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin lags te/_dmigs su ma mchis
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]so/_/de bzhin du phung po lnga po dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes
[\[164b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma
[\[164b.3\]]mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de bzhin du mig yor dang /_sprul pa dang /_gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dmigs su ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du phung po lnga po ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis na dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[164b.4\]]'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga'o/_/de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis mi
[\[164b.5\]]dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bshad pa dang [#]/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig mi zhum/_kun tu mi zhum/_'gyod
[\[164b.6\]]par mi 'gyur/_mi dngang /_kun tu mi skrag_/kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_lam shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes su thob [#]par 'gyur
[\[164b.7\]]bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste 'dzin rtog gnyis pa'o/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas zhum zhing kun tu zhum la 'gyod de/_dngang ba dang /_kun tu skrag pa dang /_kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub
[\[165a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thabs mi mkhas pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar ma gyur na ni dngang zhing kun tu skrag la [#]skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[165a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod pas mi dngang /_kun tu mi skrag_/kun tu skrag [#]pas zin par mi 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di
[\[165a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
[\[165a.5\]]tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya
[\[165a.6\]]bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
[\[165a.7\]]par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya sar so sor [#]rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong
[\[165b.2\]]zhes bya bar rtog_/gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs stong [#]zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa
[\[165b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa
[\[165b.4\]]dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de [#]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
[\[165b.5\]]ldan pa'i sems kyis [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin par rig par [#]bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
[\[165b.6\]]pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du chos ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[165b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi de mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
[\[166a.2\]]pa can de dag nyid kyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'am/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis [#]skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
[\[166a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mi dngang /_kun tu mi skrag_/kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[166a.4\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/_/tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa
[\[166a.5\]]ma yin gyi/_tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o/_/'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/_'du shes nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so/_/'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid/_
[\[166a.6\]]stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid de[#]/_stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o/_/mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig nyid stong pa nyid[#]/_stong pa nyid nyid mig
[\[166a.7\]]go/_/rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_rna ba nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'o/_/sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/_sna nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid sna'o/_/lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/_lce nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]lce'o/_/lus kyi [#]stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/_lus nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lus so/_/yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid yid do/_/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs nyid stong
[\[166b.2\]]pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/_/sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/_sgra nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o/_/dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/_dri nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid dri'o/_/ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/_ro nyid
[\[166b.3\]]stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid ro'o/_/reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/_reg nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid reg go/_/chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/_chos nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid chos so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
[\[166b.4\]]kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong
[\[166b.5\]]pa nyid nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i [#]stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa
[\[166b.6\]]ma yin gyi/_lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/
[\[166b.7\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig gi
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg

[\[167a.3\]]stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
[\[167a.4\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi [#]'dus te reg pa'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa [#]ma yin gyi/_mig gi 'dus te
[\[167a.5\]]reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba [#]stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa
[\[167a.6\]]nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te
[\[167a.7\]]reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
[\[167b.2\]]gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi [#]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar
[\[167b.3\]]gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag [#]pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs rnams kyang de bzhin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis
[\[167b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[167b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_skrag par mi 'gyur/_kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/_kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[167b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas mi dngang /_kun tu mi skrag_/kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[167b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
[\[168a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
[\[168a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan
[\[168a.4\]]ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_gang de la
[\[168a.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba
[\[168a.6\]]dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
[\[168a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
[\[168b.2\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su [#]bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_gang de la rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_
