[\[168b.3\]]stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang [#]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/_
[\[168b.4\]]rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_
[\[168b.5\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
[\[168b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi
[\[168b.7\]]zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
[\[169a.2\]]gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben
[\[169a.3\]]zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad dang [#]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
[\[169a.4\]]su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_
[\[169a.5\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg
[\[169a.6\]]pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
[\[169a.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de [#]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[169b.2\]]bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
[\[169b.3\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
[\[169b.4\]]gyis chos ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams
[\[169b.5\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
[\[169b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_
[\[169b.7\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen des
[\[170a.2\]]yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas[#]/_mi dngang /_kun tu mi skrag_/kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[170a.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig lags/_
[\[170a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_
[\[170a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad
[\[170a.6\]]mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_
[\[170a.7\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas
[\[170b.2\]]par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs phyi stong pa
[\[170b.3\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa
[\[170b.4\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang /[#]rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed
[\[170b.5\]]cing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa [#]nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
[\[170b.6\]]byed/_mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
[\[170b.7\]]la byed/_yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing [#]nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]byed pa dang /_gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_sgra
[\[171a.2\]]dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs
[\[171a.3\]]te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_
[\[171a.4\]]mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid
[\[171a.5\]]kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul
[\[171a.6\]]tshul [#]gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya ba [#]yid la byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa
[\[171a.7\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi 'dus te
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
[\[171b.2\]]stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bar [#]nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
[\[171b.3\]]la byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
[\[171b.4\]]bya bar yid la byed/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
[\[171b.5\]]la byed/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing
[\[171b.6\]]nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_sa'i khams
[\[171b.7\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa [#]nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]yid la byed/_rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_ma rig pa
[\[172a.2\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba
[\[172a.3\]]dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/_rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces [#]bya bar yid la byed cing nang
[\[172a.4\]]stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa
[\[172a.5\]]dang bral bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po
[\[172a.6\]]dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig
[\[172a.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sgom par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/_dngang zhing kun tu skrag la/_skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa gang gis
[\[172b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa thos nas/_dngang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par 'gyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos zin par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
[\[172b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[172b.4\]]dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/_'di ni chos ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi[#]/_'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o[#]/_/mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/_'di dag ni mnyan par mi
[\[172b.5\]]bya'o/_/gzung bar mi bya'o/_/bcang bar mi bya'o/_/klag par mi bya'o/_/kun chub par mi bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/_/'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
[\[172b.6\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug las bzlog [#]cing mos pa
[\[172b.7\]]med par byed de/_rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]khyod la ci zhig bya/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/_bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems
[\[173a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis [#]bsnyad pa dang /_
[\[173a.3\]]lung du [#]bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtog [#]pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa dag ston te/_'grel to[#]/_/rnam
[\[173a.4\]]par 'byed do/_/gsal bar byed do/_/yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas
[\[173a.5\]]shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/_khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/_khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang
[\[173a.6\]]mi nus so zhes zer ba ni 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[173a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po de'i [#]drung du phyin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dang /_chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag
[\[173b.2\]]gis stong ngo /_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/mig gi
[\[173b.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid
[\[173b.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [#]ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[173b.5\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag
[\[173b.6\]]dang /_lam rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi [#]las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub
[\[173b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por [#]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/_'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/_/nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang
[\[174a.2\]]shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/_'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes
[\[174a.3\]]bya ba yang med do/_/nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing
[\[174a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog [#]cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa
[\[174a.5\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las
[\[174a.6\]]bzlog [#]cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog [#]ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_
[\[174a.7\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing /_de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms [#]la nyan thos kyi sa mngon du byas shing [#]bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas
[\[174b.2\]]shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_'di ni [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na [#]'khor zhing /_rkang lag dang
[\[174b.3\]]mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/_gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar [#]yod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar [#]yod pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar [#]yod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar [#]
[\[174b.4\]]yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag [#]dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[174b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_
[\[174b.6\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar
[\[174b.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dang /_yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug
[\[175a.2\]]bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa
[\[175a.3\]]dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_
[\[175a.4\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[175a.5\]]ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa
[\[175a.6\]]dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug
[\[175a.7\]]bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_
[\[175b.2\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
[\[175b.3\]]ston pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar [#]mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du yang dag par
[\[175b.4\]]spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag
[\[175b.5\]]med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/de
[\[175b.6\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/_de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa gnyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/_/'di dag gis nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag bzhi
[\[175b.7\]]bstan to/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub [#]sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]'byor la 'di skad ces [#]bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub la ni skye ba 'am/_yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs pa ma yin te/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub
[\[176a.2\]]sems dpa'i tshig gi don med pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rang gi ngo bo yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste
[\[176a.3\]]dper na/_rmi lam la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
[\[176a.4\]]don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_
[\[176a.5\]]gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa'i rten [#]yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
[\[176a.6\]]na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin nyid la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[176a.7\]]tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid [#]dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings nyid [#]dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos nges pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid la gnas med cing mi
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rten [#]yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du
[\[176b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes [#]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de
[\[176b.3\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i [#]tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin
[\[176b.4\]]du 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
[\[176b.5\]]don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
[\[176b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[176b.7\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes
[\[177a.2\]]bu'i sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes
[\[177a.3\]]bu'i lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i [#]tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[177a.4\]]sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab
[\[177a.5\]]'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
[\[177a.6\]]med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no//_//bam po bcu gsum pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin
[\[177a.7\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
[\[177b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs
[\[177b.3\]]rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched
[\[177b.4\]]rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /[#]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[177b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
[\[177b.6\]]rgyas kyi gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin
[\[177b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab
[\[178a.2\]]'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
[\[178a.3\]]rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste
[\[178a.4\]]dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[178a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin
[\[178a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[178a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di
[\[178b.2\]]lta ste dper na/_skye ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'gag
[\[178b.3\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mi dmigs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
[\[178b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
[\[178b.5\]]sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/de
[\[178b.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'gag
[\[178b.7\]]pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang 'byung ba dang dmigs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[179a.2\]]rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/[#]gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du
[\[179a.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing
[\[179a.4\]]mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[179a.5\]]chos rnams kyi bar dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[179a.6\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[179a.7\]]la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_shin tu dben pa'i phyir gzugs la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/shin tu dben pa'i phyir tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_shin tu dben pa'i phyir/_skye mched dang /_
[\[179b.2\]]khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang /_bsdus pa rnams la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing
[\[179b.3\]]mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing
[\[179b.4\]]mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa [#]dang /_
[\[179b.5\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing
[\[179b.6\]]mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu [#]rnam par dag pa
[\[179b.7\]]la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[180a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gnas
[\[180a.3\]]med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bskal
[\[180a.4\]]pa'i [#]me 'bar ba'i tshe/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i
[\[180a.5\]]phyogs spong ba'i rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[180a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab
[\[180a.7\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de
[\[180b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la [#]rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
[\[180b.3\]]dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[180b.4\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa spong ba'i rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di
[\[180b.5\]]lta ste dper na/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med [#]cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang snying rje'i
[\[180b.6\]]rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_glog gi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[180b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i [#]mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas
[\[181a.2\]]med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi go rims kyi [#]rten yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
[\[181a.3\]]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
[\[181a.4\]]cing mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad [#]kyang ldan pa ma yin mi ldan pa [#]ma yin te/_gzugs med pa dang /_bstan du
[\[181a.5\]]med pa dang /_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste[#]/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_rtog pa med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa nyid dang /_yod par gyur pa ma yin
[\[181a.6\]]pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs [#]par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i rten yin no/_/[#]'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i rten bstan to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/_
[\[181a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar chos thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha
[\[181b.2\]]na ma tho ba med pa dang /_thun mong ba dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_chos de dag thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[181b.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos chos 'di dag rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni
[\[181b.4\]]phar shes pa dang /_mar shes pa dang /_dge sbyong du shes pa dang /_bram zer shes pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan pa la rim gror byed pa dang /_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_bsgoms
[\[181b.5\]]pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/_'di lta ste/_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs
[\[181b.6\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes [#]dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bsngos pa pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor [#]ba pa'i 'du shes dang /_rus pa pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa [#]pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[181b.7\]]'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_skye [#]ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa
[\[182a.2\]]dag ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/_'di lta ste/_rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni
[\[182a.3\]]'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun [#]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub mo dang /_ngag 'khyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba dang /_khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[182a.4\]]'chab pa dang /_'tshig pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_nga rgyal dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal te/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom
[\[182a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i ngag gi las dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i yid kyi las dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /_lung du [#]ma bstan pa'i dbang po lnga dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i skye mched
[\[182a.6\]]drug dang /_lung du [#]ma bstan pa'i gzugs med pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang /_rnam par smin pa thams cad de/_de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes brjod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom
[\[182a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams bco brgyad dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dang [#]/_'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos gang dag yin pa ste/_'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes brjod do/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[182b.2\]]rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi [#]rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_rnam
[\[182b.3\]]par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /_rtog pa dang bcas pa [#]dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med
[\[182b.4\]]la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gzugs la lta ba
[\[182b.5\]]'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes [#]las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
[\[182b.6\]]nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
[\[182b.7\]]'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad med do snyam pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa
[\[183a.2\]]thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs [#]te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/_dgu
[\[183a.3\]]gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis [#]dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas
[\[183a.4\]]nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las [#]skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang
[\[183a.5\]]ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod [#]pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bde ba yang spangs sdug
[\[183a.6\]]bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/_sdug bsngal ba yang med/_btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
[\[183a.7\]]dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam ste/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad med do snyam pas cung zad med pa'i skye mched
[\[183b.2\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes [#]med min skye mched las yang
[\[183b.3\]]dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/_'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_
[\[183b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
[\[183b.5\]]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams bco brgyad dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/_de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
[\[183b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_
[\[183b.7\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni zag pa med pa'i
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa[#]/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_
[\[184a.2\]]gzhan yang khams gsum par ma [#]gtogs pa'i chos gang cung zad yod pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos
[\[184a.3\]]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi mngon pa ste/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags zad pa/_zhe sdang zad pa/_gti mug zad pa/_de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma
[\[184a.4\]]yin pa de bzhin nyid/_chos nyid/_chos kyi dbyings/_chos gnas pa nyid[#]/_chos nges pa nyid[#]/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/_
[\[184a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/_de dag ni byis pa so so'i [#]skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom
[\[184a.6\]]ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[184a.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]la chags par mi bya zhing /_chos thams cad ni [#]gnyis su med pa'i tshul du rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[184b.2\]]dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang brjod pa ci'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur
[\[184b.3\]]ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po de gang lags/_bcom ldan
[\[184b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas
[\[184b.5\]]dang /_sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/_rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[184b.6\]]chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed do/_/sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed
[\[184b.7\]]pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du bdag gis 'khor ba dpag tu med pa sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha bgos nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar byas so[#]/_/
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su [#]mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das [#]kyang sems
[\[185a.2\]]can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs par bya ba yin no/_/bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos
[\[185a.3\]]thams cad rjes su rtogs pa thams cad du song [#]ba la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos rnams kyi tshul gcig tu mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya'o/_/bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis byang chub kyi
[\[185a.4\]]phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par sgrub pa rtogs pa'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la
[\[185a.5\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/_rab 'byor 'di
[\[185a.6\]]ni gang la gnas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
[\[185a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de bdag gis nyams su myong bar
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya ba ni/_'di ltar ji srid du/_sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
[\[185b.2\]]stong mang por de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du [#]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam zhing tshul 'di nyid kyis [#]sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya
[\[185b.3\]]ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad nyams su myong bar byas te/_de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
[\[185b.4\]]brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed
[\[185b.5\]]par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed pa gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar bya ba rlabs po che'i sems su bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[185b.6\]]chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni 'di yin te/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung [#]nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed[#]/_zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed[#]/_gti mug gi sems mi bskyed[#]/_brtse [#]ba'i sems mi bskyed[#]/_nyan thos kyi sems dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi
[\[185b.7\]]bskyed [#]pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du byed kyang des rlom sems su mi byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba nyid ni 'di yin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la byed cing /_des [#]rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis
[\[186a.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi [#]sgul ba'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems
[\[186a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/_sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yin pa des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas na sems can gyi tshogs
[\[186a.4\]]chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos la dga' ba dang /_
[\[186a.5\]]chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/_/de la chos gang zhe na/_chos thams cad dbyer med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni chos zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/_chos la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni chos la
[\[186a.6\]]dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la kun dga' ba gang zhe na/_chos sgom zhing mang du byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni chos la kun dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la dga' ba dang /_kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/_mngon par sbyor ba ste/_'di ni chos la dga'
[\[186a.7\]]ba dang /_chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur ba [#]de mi dmigs pa'i
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas[#]/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/_
[\[186b.2\]]sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/_
[\[186b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi
[\[186b.4\]]sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nam mkha' ltar chags pa [#]med pas/_rnam
[\[186b.5\]]par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ste[#]/_rab 'byor chos [#]de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[186b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos 'di dag la gnas te/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin no/_/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni/_sems can
[\[186b.7\]]thams cad kyi mchog nyid du sems dpa'i [#]sems chen po nyid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod pa la khyod spobs par byos shig_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems
[\[187a.2\]]can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_skye ba por lta ba dang /_gso bar lta [#]ba dang /_skyes bur lta ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_
[\[187a.3\]]yod par lta ba dang /_med par lta ba dang /_phung por lta ba dang /_khams su lta ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar [#]lta ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs par lta ba dang /_
[\[187a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya bar [#]lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar lta ba dang /_byang chub rnam par rtog [#]par lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /_chos su lta ba dang /_dge 'dun du lta ba dang /_chos
[\[187a.5\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rnams te/_lta ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu spang ba'i slad du/_sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/_de'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa
[\[187a.6\]]rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar
[\[187a.7\]]'gyur ba nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do[#]/_/de bzhin du rgya cher skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i bar du
[\[187b.2\]]dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam
[\[187b.3\]]yan lag brgyad pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_yi ge rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis
[\[187b.4\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi [#]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[187b.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du dmigs [#]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur
[\[187b.6\]]ba yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas/_
[\[187b.7\]]lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to zhes bya ba ni spong ba chen po nyid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed [#]cig_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems dang [#]mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang
[\[188a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems/_zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i sems gang lags pa de la yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/_chags pa ma mchis pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[188a.3\]]po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar sems de ni sems ma lags te/_des na de la chags pa ma mchis so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[188a.4\]]po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung [#]ste/_
[\[188a.5\]]chos 'ga' yang skye ba'am/_'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phel ba 'am/_'grib pa 'am/_'ong ba 'am/_'gro ba 'am[#]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med cing
[\[188a.6\]]'gag pa med pa dang /_'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /_'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
[\[188a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khong du chud pa med pa'i
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes gang smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la [#]chags pa med pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la [#]yang chags pa med pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad
[\[188b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa yin nam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_gzugs kyang chags pa med pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten
