[\[188b.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bar yang chags pa med pa'o/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang chags pa med do[#]/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
[\[188b.4\]]kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing khong du [#]chud pa med pa zhes [#]gang smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa
[\[188b.5\]]so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams [#]thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma
[\[188b.6\]]gtogs pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
[\[188b.7\]]phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar yin na/_gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de
[\[189a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
[\[189a.3\]]yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[189a.4\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang
[\[189a.5\]]khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_tshor ba yang tshor ba med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_'du shes kyang 'du shes med pa la chags pa med pa yin
[\[189a.6\]]nam/_'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang [#]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[189a.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de [#]de
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin no[#]/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa [#]la chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par
[\[189b.2\]]'byung ba so so ba dang /_bsdus pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[189b.3\]]dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha
[\[189b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med de/_de'i phyir
[\[189b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa chen po nyid do/_/'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba bstan to/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub
[\[189b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig_/gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ni
[\[189b.7\]]theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/_de ni theg pa chen por yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags te/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi don du spyod pa
[\[190a.2\]]na sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyi tshe ba zhig gi
[\[190a.3\]]don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sems can
[\[190a.4\]]thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom [#]par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/
[\[190a.5\]]sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/_sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu [#]dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su bcad pas go cha mi gyon gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[190a.6\]]po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[190a.7\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis kyang
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]byang chub kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya/_gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs
[\[190b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa [#]zhes bya ba
[\[190b.3\]]ni bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no//_//bam po bcu bzhi pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
[\[190b.4\]]yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su
[\[190b.5\]]gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[190b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yid la byed pa spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[190b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa gtong ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la brjod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson
[\[191a.2\]]'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[191a.3\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub
[\[191a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su
[\[191a.5\]]gtong ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs/_sbyin par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[191a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag
[\[191a.7\]]la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs [#]pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste dang po'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[\[191b.2\]]tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
[\[191b.3\]]pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi bskyed [#]na/_so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos [#]pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul
[\[191b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rtog pa 'di
[\[191b.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha
[\[191b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
[\[191b.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang [#]thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[192a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /_tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshul khrims de yang
[\[192a.3\]]mi dmigs shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[192a.4\]]phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[192a.5\]]drug po'i go cha ste gnyis pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
[\[192a.6\]]thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[192a.7\]]dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[192b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang nges [#]pa dang /_rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha
[\[192b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[192b.4\]]brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang
[\[192b.5\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha
[\[192b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos
[\[192b.7\]]thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing /_bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos [#]zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste
[\[193a.2\]]gsum pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
[\[193a.3\]]sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di [#]ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing [#]sbyin pa'i
[\[193a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
[\[193a.5\]]bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad [#]dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
[\[193a.6\]]tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[193a.7\]]chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod [#]pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /_brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[193b.2\]]dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[193b.3\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[193b.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad [#]sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
[\[193b.5\]]te/_brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing /_brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[193b.6\]]chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha
[\[193b.7\]]chen po bgos zhes bya'o [#]zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste bzhi pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_
[\[194a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas
[\[194a.3\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub
[\[194a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas
[\[194a.5\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_
[\[194a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa
[\[194a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad
[\[194b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/_de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa
[\[194b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su [#]bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin [#]pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
[\[194b.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas [#]ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/_chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar
[\[194b.5\]]gnas te/_bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[194b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_
[\[194b.7\]]de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste lnga pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[195a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
[\[195a.3\]]cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[195a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[195a.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod la [#]mos shing rtog pa [#]ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
[\[195a.6\]]shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[195a.7\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[195b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
[\[195b.3\]]te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[195b.4\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de/_de yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas [#]ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas [#]pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_
[\[195b.5\]]chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
[\[195b.6\]]su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi [#]pha rol tu
[\[195b.7\]]phyin pa drug po 'di dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/_mi dmigs pa de ltar na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ba yin no/_/tshe dang
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re res gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste drug pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa
[\[196a.2\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed/_de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur [#]te/_de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin/_de bzhin du tshad med pa dang /_
[\[196a.3\]]gzugs med pa'i [#]snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gi ro myong [#]bar mi byed/_de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur/_de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol [(]tu
[\[196a.4\]]tu [,]tu [)]phyin pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa mthong bas
[\[196a.5\]]gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon [#]du byed pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des na
[\[196a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /_ming [#]yongs su sgrogs par [#]mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams
[\[196a.7\]]che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go zhes bya ba ni drug
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]pa'i go cha'i mjug bsdu ba'o/_/go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to//_//shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_theg pa chen po la 'dzeg par 'gyur ba yin/_gang
[\[196b.2\]]pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i [#]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben pa [#]sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis [#]dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba
[\[196b.3\]]can bsam gtan dang po la [#]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa la [#]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched
[\[196b.4\]]dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms
[\[196b.5\]]par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa na/_nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo [#]bar byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[196b.6\]]dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[196b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms [#]par 'jug par byed/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /_
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing /_de bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa na/_nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma yid la byed pas
[\[197a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub
[\[197a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/_theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/_/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs
[\[197a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa yin no/_/[#]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
[\[197a.5\]]yid la byed pas [#]sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
[\[197a.6\]]pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis [#]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms [#]par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba [#]yang 'di lta ste/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/_sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/_
[\[197a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis [#]gnas pa na 'di snyam ste/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_nges par sems par byed pa 'di ni/_
[\[197b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
[\[197b.3\]]rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/_brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[197b.4\]]dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /_mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems
[\[197b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med
[\[197b.6\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs kyang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems
[\[197b.7\]]su mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]pa yin no/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom [#]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan
[\[198a.2\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa sgom [#]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par byed pa 'di ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
[\[198a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de [#]byams pa dang ldan pa'i [#]sems yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad med pa/_
[\[198a.4\]]khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa [#]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing /_nye bar
[\[198a.5\]]bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so/_/de snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad med
[\[198a.6\]]pa/_khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing /_nye bar
[\[198a.7\]]bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems can thams
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed/_snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /_sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_snying brtse ba la gzhol bar byed/_dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /_bdag nyid kyis [#]sems can dga' bar bya'o zhes
[\[198b.2\]]sems can rnams la gzhol bar byed/_btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /_sems can rnams zag pa zad pa la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[198b.3\]]nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing /_rnam par ldang [#]yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
[\[198b.4\]]su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[198b.5\]]'jug pa de dag gis ma [#]'dres par rnam par spyod cing /_sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi bskyed [#]kyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang /_'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i
[\[198b.6\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di
[\[198b.7\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog la/_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang [#]mi skye zhing /_de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/_de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
[\[199a.2\]]pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog
[\[199a.3\]]cing /_rnam par ldang ba la[#]/_de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas
[\[199a.4\]]kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug
[\[199a.5\]]pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_gang [#]nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/_phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med
[\[199a.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa gang yin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
[\[199a.7\]]chen po ni/_chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par mnyam par gzhag [#]pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug_/mi rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon
[\[199b.2\]]pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i
[\[199b.3\]]dus la shes pa mi 'jug_/ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/_de gsum po 'di gsum [#]la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/
[\[199b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa [#]'jug par mi byed/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams
[\[199b.5\]]la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
[\[199b.6\]]dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/_de 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_
[\[199b.7\]]'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o/_/[#]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang /_des
[\[200a.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs te/_sbyin pa po dang /_len pa po dang /_sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi
[\[200a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang de mi dmigs pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha
[\[200a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs[#]/_yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la
[\[200a.5\]]'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du/_byang chub
[\[200a.6\]]kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[200a.7\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi
[\[200b.2\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
[\[200b.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de ltar shes so/_/gzugs [#]dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_
[\[200b.4\]]gzugs zhes bya bar shes so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya bar de ltar shes so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel
[\[200b.5\]]par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya bar shes so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar de ltar shes so/_/
[\[200b.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[200b.7\]]zhes bya bar shes so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya bar shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar shes so/_/nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_
[\[201a.2\]]'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so/_/phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar
[\[201a.3\]]shes so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so/_/de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid ces bya bar
[\[201a.4\]]shes so/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos nges pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha'
[\[201a.5\]]zhes bya bar shes so/_/byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_byang chub ces bya bar shes so/_/sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/_tshe dang ldan
[\[201a.6\]]pa [#]shA ri'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba la 'jug pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas [#]nye bar bzung ste/_snying
[\[201a.7\]]po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas gang la mchod pa dang bkur sti gang bya bar [#]'os pa'i mchod pas/_sangs rgyas
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang chos nyan te/_'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po 'di nyid do/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la 'dzegs [#]nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
[\[201b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /_de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /_sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/de gnyis su med
[\[201b.3\]]pa'i sa la gnas shing /_lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam zhing [#]yongs su 'dzin to/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa chen po de dang nam yang mi 'bral lo zhes bya ba ni mngon
[\[201b.4\]]par shes pa la 'jug pa'o/_/[#]des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen
[\[201b.5\]]po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
[\[201b.6\]]gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i [#]mchog la 'dzegs nas
[\[201b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor [#]bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog [#]cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub
[\[202a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig_/theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor [#]bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing
[\[202a.3\]]dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'dzeg [#]pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'o/_/[#]'di dag gis ni 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bstan to//_//
[\[202a.4\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa/_go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos
[\[202a.5\]]zhes bgyi ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i go cha 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang /_
[\[202a.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi
[\[202a.7\]]go cha bgos/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam gyi
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]go cha bgos/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/_mngon par shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
[\[202b.2\]]go cha bgos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi [#]go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/_shar phyogs kyi [#]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par
[\[202b.3\]]'gengs so/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/stong gsum
[\[202b.4\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu rab tu bskyod do/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu rab tu bskyod do/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar dang /_shar
[\[202b.5\]]lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu [#]rab tu bskyod do/_/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji
[\[202b.6\]]snyed cig [#]yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas shing sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu bcil nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems
[\[202b.7\]]can dmyal ba pa'i [#]sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang /_bde ba thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]gang nas[#]/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_de dang de dag tu skyes te[#]/_lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de
[\[203a.2\]]dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/_lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor
[\[203a.3\]]'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig [#]lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba [#]dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/_de ltar
[\[203a.4\]]mngon par sprul nas ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs par gyur te/_de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas [#]dang /_
[\[203a.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dang de dag las rnam par langs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang /_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu de [#]sems can gang yang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
[\[203a.6\]]rnam par blang [#]ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song
[\[203a.7\]]gsum las yongs su bkrol [#]yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis [#]de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni snying rje'i tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par
[\[203b.2\]]byed do/_/de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/_bzhon pa 'dod
[\[203b.3\]]pa rnams la bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la [#]gos/_me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog_/phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/_khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/_'tsho ba 'dod pa
[\[203b.4\]]rnams la 'tsho ba/_yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen [#]rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_be+e DUr+ya dang /_dung dang [#]/_man shel dang /_byi [#]ru dang /_gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang /_
[\[203b.5\]]mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi [#]ru dang /_gser dang dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing /_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed[#]/_des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin [#]nas/_sems can de dag
[\[203b.6\]]la chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/_/sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/_
[\[203b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin/_mi'i yo byad
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/_rab 'byor de la [#]ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/_sems can gang la yang ci yang sbyin [#]pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom
[\[204a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang /_sems can gang la [#]ci yang byin pa med do/_/
[\[204a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang
[\[204a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing ched du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de [#]'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/_sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu
[\[204a.5\]]dgod do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs
[\[204a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos [#]ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams [#]rab tu 'god de/_sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/_chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta
[\[204a.7\]]ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/_lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/_sangs
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/_rab 'byor de la [#]ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
[\[204b.2\]]bar la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod
[\[204b.3\]]de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang /_sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems
[\[204b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs so//_//bam po bco lnga pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing [#]/_sems can thams cad bzod
[\[204b.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'jog la rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'jog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab
[\[204b.6\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_'di ltar go cha gyon te/_brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyig pa dang /_khu tshur gyis rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga'
[\[204b.7\]]tsam yang bskyed par mi bya zhing sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de dang [#]'dra ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam mo/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god pa byas na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa [#]des sems can gang yang
[\[205a.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa de snyed dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[205a.3\]]pa la bkod kyang /_sems can [#]yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na[#]/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir dang [#]/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[205a.4\]]po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog
[\[205a.5\]]la rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /_gzhog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor
[\[205a.6\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan
[\[205a.7\]]po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa [#]des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma [#]mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[205b.2\]]dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa de snyed pa de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang /_sems can gang yang [#]lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos
[\[205b.3\]]nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
[\[205b.4\]]shing sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha
[\[205b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par [#]sbyor zhing gzhog la/_rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing /_chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng ba'am rnam par mi g.yeng bar yang dag par rjes su
[\[205b.6\]]mi mthong na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog pa dang rab tu 'god pa byed de/_de ltar yang dag par sbyor ba rnams kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[205b.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang
[\[206a.2\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod
[\[206a.3\]]kyang sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen
[\[206a.4\]]po bgos pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[206a.5\]]rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /_gzhog la [#]rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[206a.6\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang yang tshu rol tam/_pha rol du mi dmigs te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_de [#]de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha
[\[206a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]mngon par sprul te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyar te gzhog [#]la rab tu bkod na/_rab 'byor de la [#]ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/_
[\[206b.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[206b.3\]]bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor
[\[206b.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed 'khod [#]pa de
[\[206b.5\]]dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[206b.6\]]phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/chos kyang ston te/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid
[\[206b.7\]]do/_/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de
[\[207a.2\]]bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
[\[207a.3\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/_/'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/_/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[207a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par [#]sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i
[\[207a.5\]]tshogs kyi mdun du/[#]skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog [#]la rab tu bkod par gyur na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang pha rol
[\[207a.6\]]tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog [#]la rab tu bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
[\[207a.7\]]gi bye ma snyed dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]la bkod kyang sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
[\[207b.2\]]bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed de/_bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig
[\[207b.3\]]ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[207b.4\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed
[\[207b.5\]]cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig
[\[207b.6\]]ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis
[\[207b.7\]]sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed [#]cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[208a.2\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod
