[\[226b.7\]]ro zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/thung du bskor na thung du bskor ro zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran bzhin du dbugs 'byung na dran bzhin du dbugs 'byung ngo zhes [#]
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs na dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs so zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dbugs ring du 'byung na dbugs ring du 'byung ngo zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab
[\[227a.2\]]tu shes so/_/dbugs thung du 'byung na dbugs thung du 'byung ngo [#]zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung du nang du 'byung na dbugs thung du 'byung ngo zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/[#]dbugs thung du rngubs na dbugs thung du rngubs
[\[227a.3\]]so zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_rang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing
[\[227a.4\]]gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus 'di nyid las [#]sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_
[\[227a.5\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams rnams la so so [#]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs [#]par byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ba lang gi shan [#]pa'am ba lang gi shan [#]pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon pos ba lang bsad nas cha bzhir byed do/_/
[\[227a.6\]]cha bzhir byas nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang lus 'di nyid las [#]sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams
[\[227a.7\]]rnams so sor yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas rang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil [#]yan chad nas spyi bo man chad kyi skra
[\[227b.2\]]dang /_klad pa dang /_sen mo dang /_spu dang pags pa'i mthar thug par mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang /[ #]sen mo dang /_so dang /_pags pa dang /_skyi dang /_sha dang /_chu ba dang /_khrag dang /_
[\[227b.3\]]rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_snying dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_mcher pa dang /_long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_nang grol dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_rngul dang /_tshil dang [#]/_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_rnag dang /_khrag
[\[227b.4\]]rul dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu ser dang /_kha chu dang /_dri ma dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_mig rnag dang /_rna [#]spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste[#]/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_zhing pa'i bang ba 'bras so ba dang /_
[\[227b.5\]]'bru dang /_til dang /_'bras [#]drus ma dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sran chung dang /_nyungs [#]kar sna tshogs kyis gang ba de phye ste/_mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis de dag la bltas nas/_'di ni 'bras so ba'o/_/'di ni 'bru'o/_/'di ni til
[\[227b.6\]]lo/_/'di ni 'bras drus ma'o/_/'di ni mon sran sde'u'o[#]/_/'di ni mon sran gre'u'o/_/'di ni nas so/_/'di ni gro'o/_/'di ni sran chung ngo /_/'di ni nyungs [#]kar ro zhes bya bar shes so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang lus 'di nyid la rkang
[\[227b.7\]]pa'i mthil yan chad nas/_spyi bo man chad kyi skra dang /_klad pa dang /_sen mo dang /_spu dang /_pags pa'i mthar thug [#]par mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_pags pa dang /_
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]skyi dang /_sha dang /_chu [#]dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_snying dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_mcher pa dang /_long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_nang grol dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_rngul dang /_
[\[228a.2\]]tshil dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_rnag dang /_khrag rul dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu ser dang /_kha chu dang /_dri ma dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_mig rnag dang /_rna [#]spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_rab 'byor
[\[228a.3\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang [#]ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par
[\[228a.4\]]rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du song bas dur khrod du bor zhing shi ba'i lam na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am/_
[\[228a.5\]]shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/_rnam par bam pa dang /_rnam par bsngos pa dang /_rnam par rnags [#]pa dang /_rnam par zos pa dang /_rnam par 'thor ba [#]mthong na/_de lus 'di
[\[228a.6\]]yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no/_/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid 'di las ma 'das so/_/zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig
[\[228a.7\]]rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag bdun lon pa 'am/_bya rog gam/_khwa'am/_'ol ba 'am/_bya rgod dam/_spyang ki 'am/_wa dang [#]/_khyi dang [#]/_de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis za ba
[\[228b.2\]]mthong ba nas/_de la lus sna tshogs kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das so zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa [#]shes bzhin can dran
[\[228b.3\]]pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[228b.4\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam ro gang dang gang dag dur khrod du bor ba rnam par zos pa/_mi gtsang ba[#]/_rnags pa/_dri nga ba mthong ba na de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang
[\[228b.5\]]tshul de nyid [#]dang nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs
[\[228b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du [#]keng rus kyi phreng ba sha ra ri dang /_khrag ra ri chags pa/_rgyus pas brang breng
[\[228b.7\]]du 'brel pa mthong ba nas/_de lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan
[\[229a.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag med par rgyus pa'i zungs med pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba na/_lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_
[\[229a.3\]]'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar [#]sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i
[\[229a.4\]]lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no//_//bam po bcu bdun pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[229a.5\]]nam dur khrod du keng rus kyi tshogs zungs med pa gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/_sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba na/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor
[\[229a.6\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam
[\[229a.7\]]par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba 'di lta ste/_rkang [#]pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_byin pa'i rus pa
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]rnams kyang gzhan du/_brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_dpyi'i [#]rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_tshigs [#]pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_rtsib [#]ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_mjing [#]pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_dpung pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du/_mgo'i rus pa
[\[229b.2\]]rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor [#]ba mthong na/_de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o[#]/_/zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[229b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa
[\[229b.4\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/_rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/_dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba na/_de [#]lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di
[\[229b.5\]]lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa/_shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi
[\[229b.6\]]bde ba rnam par bsal nas phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin [#]pa la spyod
[\[229b.7\]]pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma song ba [#]rab rib snang ba sngon por gyur pa/_thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/_zegs pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'dres par gyur pa mthong na/_de lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]'das pa'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas [#]nang gi
[\[230a.2\]]lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de bzhin du brtun pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
[\[230a.3\]]nas tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog [#]go/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan
[\[230a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed
[\[230a.5\]]pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/_/rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/yang dag par rab tu 'jog go/_/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong [#]ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed [#]do/_/rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/yang dag par
[\[230a.6\]]rab tu 'jog go/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/_/rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/yang dag par rab tu 'jog go/_/de dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /_phyir zhing 'byung ba dang /_mi brjed pa dag [#]
[\[230a.7\]]nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/_/rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/yang dag par rab tu 'jog go/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du
[\[230b.2\]]byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa[#]/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/_/de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems kyi ting nge
[\[230b.3\]]'dzin dang /_dpyod [#]pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste/_rab 'byor 'di
[\[230b.4\]]yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_dbang po lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_
[\[230b.5\]]dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_rab 'byor de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni
[\[230b.6\]]'di lta ste/_stobs lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs te/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
[\[230b.7\]]po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/_bdun gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/_/chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
[\[231a.2\]]dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su
[\[231a.3\]]bsgyur ba de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
[\[231a.4\]]ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas [#]yongs su bsgyur ba de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom [#]mo/_/yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_
[\[231a.5\]]yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba de yang mi
[\[231a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste[#]/_rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste[#]/_ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi
[\[231a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa ste/_'di ni
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de la smon pa med pa'i
[\[231b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin gsum yin te/_rab
[\[231b.3\]]'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_shes pa bcu gcig ste/_bcu gcig gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba
[\[231b.4\]]shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal shes
[\[231b.5\]]pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni sdug bsngal shes pa'o/_/de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/_kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni kun 'byung ba shes pa'o/_/de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa gang
[\[231b.6\]]yin pa ste/_de ni 'gog par shes pa'o/_/de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/_'gog pa mngon du byed pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni lam shes pa'o/_/de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par [#]shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni [#]zad pa shes pa'o/_/de
[\[231b.7\]]la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_mi skye ba la mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni mi skye ba shes pa'o/_/de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/_phung po lnga po rnams kyi chos nye bar gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni chos shes pa'o/_/de la rjes su 'gro ba shes pa gang zhe na/_mig mi rtag
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi rtag pa nas/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang /_bsdus pa rnams kyi bar la de ltar shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni rjes su 'gro ba shes pa'o/_/de la kun
[\[232a.2\]]rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis [#]shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni kun rdzob shes pa'o/_/de la yongs su 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/_lam yongs su 'dris pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni 'dris pa shes pa'o/_/sgra ji bzhin shes pa
[\[232a.3\]]gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni sgra ji bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan
[\[232a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_dbang po gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa bsrung ba'i dbang po'o/_/de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed
[\[232a.5\]]pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang ba med cing 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni
[\[232a.6\]]mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_slob pa'i gang zag kun shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po snang
[\[232a.7\]]ba med cing 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la kun shes pa bsrung [#]ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/_mi slob pa'i gang zag dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni kun shes pa bsrung [#]ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba [#]ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[232b.2\]]chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin
[\[232b.3\]]dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rtog pa dang bcas shing [#]dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa rnams kyis dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis dben/_rtog pa dang
[\[232b.4\]]bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang
[\[232b.5\]]zhe na/_bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/_'di ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_bsam gtan gnyis pa nas [#]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
[\[232b.6\]]bar la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[232b.7\]]po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_rjes su dran pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs rngubs [#]pa dang 'byung ba rjes su dran pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang
[\[233a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/_rab 'byor 'di
[\[233a.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni [#]'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[233a.4\]]chen po gnas la yang gnas su [#]gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba [#]las yang dag par len pa rnam par smin pa gnas dang rgyu'i sgo nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_
[\[233a.5\]]'jig rten gyi [#]khams sna tshogs can dang mos pa du ma can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs pa dang /_mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du [#]rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan
[\[233a.6\]]rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[233a.7\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_de sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang /_de lha'i mig gis sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]rab tu shes pa dang /_de zag pa zad pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i phyir [#]sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon du byas nas nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas shing bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/
[\[233b.2\]]bya ba byas so/_/'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[233b.3\]]chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_kye ma bdag gi [#]chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_'dir nga la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_
[\[233b.4\]]bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung bas 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur [#]ba de lta bu'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang [#]/_mi 'jigs pa thob pas
[\[233b.5\]]gnas te/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung bas chos dang ldan par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus
[\[233b.6\]]pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya zhes bya ba dang /_kye ma bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na[#]/_'dir nga la zag pa 'di rnams [#]ma zad do/_/yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung bas
[\[233b.7\]]'jig rten na chos dang ldan pa rgol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'dir rgyu de yang yang [#]dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pas gnas te/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung bas chos dang ldan pas 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis
[\[234a.2\]]rab tu bskor bar bya zhes bya ba dang /_gang yang ngas bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag bsten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/_'dir nga la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa 'am/_gzhan su yang rung bas [#]'jig rten na chos
[\[234a.3\]]dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir rgyu de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pas gnas te/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam
[\[234a.4\]]bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus par [#]bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/ngas 'phags
[\[234a.5\]]pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i rgyu nges par 'byin pa bstan pa gang yin pa [#]de bsgrubs na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i don du nges par 'byin par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/_'dir yang nga la de yang dag par bsgrubs kyang sdug bsngal [#]yang
[\[234a.6\]]dag par zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung bas 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ba [#]de lta bu'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_
[\[234a.7\]]de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pas gnas te/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag [#]go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gzhan su yang [#]rung bas chos dang ldan pa 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan
[\[234b.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po [#]'di lta ste/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang
[\[234b.3\]]dag par rig pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
[\[234b.4\]]de/_bco brgyad gang zhe na/_gang gi mtshan mo la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par [#]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas gang gi mtshan mo la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang
[\[234b.5\]]bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'
[\[234b.6\]]ba dang /_ca co mi mnga' ba dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang /_'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' ba dang /_thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga' ba dang /_ma brtags [#]pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' ba dang /_'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang /_brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa
[\[234b.7\]]mi mnga' ba dang /_dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang /_shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang /_rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]mnga' ba dang /_sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_thugs kyi phrin las thams cad kyang ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
[\[235a.2\]]'brang ba dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste/_'di dag ni
[\[235a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni lam gyi tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di
[\[235a.4\]]lta ste/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/_de yang yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang /_yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ges rab tu 'jug pa'o/_/de yang [#]yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang /_yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ges 'jug pa gang zhe na/_a zhes bya ba ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[235a.5\]]ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho [#]dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[235a.6\]]la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas yongs su chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ba zhes bya ba ni 'ching ba dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad
[\[235a.7\]]kyi sgo'o/_/Da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/wa zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sta zhes bya ba ni [#]khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po dmigs su med [#]pa'i phyir chos thams
[\[235b.2\]]cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i
[\[235b.3\]]phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sha zhes
[\[235b.4\]]bya ba ni zhi gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sta zhes bya ba ni stong [#]pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir
[\[235b.5\]]chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Na [#]zhes bya ba ni gzhan mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ha [#]zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/b+ha [#]zhes bya ba ni 'jig [#]pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad
[\[235b.6\]]kyi sgo'o/_/tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/hwa [#]zhes bya ba ni bad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni spro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[235b.7\]]g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Tha zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrub [#]pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir [#]chos
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ska zhes bya ba ni phung po mi [#]dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dzA [#]zhes bya ba ni dga' ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tse zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Ta zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba mi
[\[236a.2\]]dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ha [#]zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [#]gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang /_gang gis rjod pa [#]dang /_gang gis bstan pa dang /_gang gis
[\[236a.3\]]rtogs par byed pa dang /_gang gis mthong ba'i ming ni 'ga' yang med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ni dpe nam mkha' bzhin du khong du chud par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa/_a la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang [#]
[\[236a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig gis a la sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su [#]shes na de ni sgra gang la yang thogs par mi 'gyur zhing de thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid du sgrub par 'gyur te/_sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[236a.5\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya 'di dag la sogs pa'i yi ge la [#]nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed cing /_gzhan dag la yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos ston na/_de la legs pa nyi
[\[236a.6\]]shu yod par shes par bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur/_rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro[#]/_/blo dang ldan par 'gyur/_brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_shes rab dang ldan par
[\[236a.7\]]'gyur/_spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang tshegs chung ngus thob par 'gyur/_de la som nyi med par 'gyur/_yid gnyis med par 'gyur/_gzhan la sgra'i ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba med cing tshig rtsub pos khong khro bar mi 'gyur
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]zhing mtho bar mi 'gyur/_dma' bar mi 'gyur te/_ji lta ba bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[236b.2\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rgyu la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas
[\[236b.3\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i rna ba'i [#]shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_zag pa zad pa shes
[\[236b.4\]]pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste[#]/_phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor
[\[236b.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo [#]a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[236b.6\]]po [#]theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar te/_rab 'byor ji ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing
[\[236b.7\]]sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la 'pho ba med pas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang yang 'ong ba'am 'gro ba 'am/_'pho ba 'am/_nye bar 'pho ba med de/_'on kyang chos thams cad kyi sa gang yin pa de la rlom sems su mi byed cing mi sems la sa yongs
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]su sbyong ba yang byed cing sa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyang ba [#]bcu po
[\[237a.2\]]'di dag bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing [#]/_sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /_
[\[237a.3\]]sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang /_len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_des rlom sems su mi bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir
[\[237a.4\]]yang dang yang du 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku la 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'grel [#]pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir
[\[237a.5\]]nga rgyal gyi khengs pa bsal ba nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /_tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/_rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
[\[237a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan du bya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor ba dang /_bzod pa'i stobs la gnas
[\[237a.7\]]pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar byas pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong [#]ba dang /_snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /_bla ma la dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par nyan pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pas 'tshol [#]ba ste/_
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rab 'byor chos brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan du bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la
[\[237b.2\]]gnas par bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing de la yang yi ge la mngon par ma zhen pa dang /_zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing
[\[237b.3\]]yongs su bsngo na yang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /_dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med cing des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/_rab 'byor chos lnga po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
[\[237b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blangs shing gnas par bya ste/_de dag yongs su gtang [#]bar mi bya'o/_/bcu
[\[237b.5\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtong ba dang /_bslab [#]pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
[\[237b.6\]]pa dang /_rdzas thams cad yongs su gtong [#]ba dang /_sems zhum pa med pa dang /_dngos po thams cad la ltos [#]pa med pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas yongs su gtang bar mi bya zhing /_yang dag par
[\[237b.7\]]blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_rigs
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_bdag la bstod par bya [#]ba dang /_gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o[#]/_/mi dge ba [#]bcu'i [#]lam yongs su
[\[238a.2\]]spang bar bya'o/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa dang /_phyin ci log rnams dang /_the tshom dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyams rangs su gzhag [#]pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/chos bcu po de [#]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la
[\[238a.3\]]gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas chos drug po [#]yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya
[\[238a.4\]]ste/_drug gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/skrag pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/slong [#]mo pa mthong na zhum pa med par bya ste/_zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dngos po thams cad yongs
[\[238a.5\]]su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya ste/_yid mi bde ba yongs su spang bar bya'o[#]/_/slong mo pa mthong na slong mo pas 'khrugs par mi bya ste/_'khrugs pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas
[\[238a.6\]]yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa
[\[238a.7\]]dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang /_rgyur lta ba dang /_ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang /_phung po la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams la mngon par chags pa dang /_skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]gsum na gnas pa dang /_khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams gsum la brten pa dang /_sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_tshul
[\[238b.2\]]khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/_rab 'byor chos nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas mi bya'o/_/des chos nyi shu po 'di dag
[\[238b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid rdzogs par bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba dang /_smon pa med pa shes par bya ba dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang /_sems can de dag la
[\[238b.4\]]brnyas par mi bya ba dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs te des kyang mi rlom [#]pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang /_rtogs [#]pa yang dag par gsal ba
[\[238b.5\]]dang /_lta ba rnam par bzlog [#]pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_zhi gnas la nges par sems pa [#]dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /_sems dul ba dang /_thams cad [#]thogs pa med pa'i shes pa dang /_chags pa'i sa ma yin pa dang /_gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[238b.6\]]der yang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas nas bdag gi dngos po ston pa ste/_rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[238b.7\]]chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]yongs su sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bzhi po 'di [#]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor
[\[239a.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang [#]
[\[239a.3\]]mnyam par 'jog pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub cing ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs
[\[239a.4\]]su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas [#]yongs su bzung ba ste/_ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta [#]de ltar phun sum tshogs
[\[239a.5\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes pa dang /_ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[239a.6\]]rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yon tan thams
[\[239a.7\]]cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba gang lags/_
[\[239b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang dag par sdud pa gang yin pa 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i
[\[239b.3\]]bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad kyi don du theg pa chen po'i ye shes tshol zhing sgrub par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems
[\[239b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas tshad med pa bzhi po
[\[239b.5\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang
[\[239b.6\]]ba gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]gtong ba yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs
[\[239b.7\]]su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par bskul ba dang /_gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag [#]bsten pa
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
[\[240a.2\]]btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos tshol zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[240a.3\]]chen po'i yang dang yang nges par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi med par nges par 'byung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung zhing der yang bar chad byed pa gang yang med pa gang yin pa [#]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang
[\[240a.4\]]yang nges par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi sku yid la bya ba dang /_nam yang 'bral [#]
[\[240a.5\]]bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin
[\[240a.6\]]gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba [#]'am yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston cing thog mar yang dge_/bar du yang dge_/tha mar yang dge_/yi ge bzang po/_don bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa 'di
[\[240a.7\]]lta ste/_mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la dbab [#]par bstan pa dag yang dag
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]par ston pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par [#]dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_nga rgyal dang khengs pa yongs su bsal ba des nam yang
[\[240b.2\]]rigs dma' bar mi skye ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//_//bam po bco brgyad pa/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji [#]skad smras
[\[240b.3\]]pa de ltar byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/rab 'byor de dag [#]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyong ba bcu'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[240b.4\]]dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing de ma yin pa'i [#]tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub
[\[240b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe phan pa chung ngu zhig kyang 'khor
[\[240b.6\]]ba ma zad kyi bar du chud mi gson na/_mang po lta ci [#]smos te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o[#]/_/de la [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la gnod sems med
[\[240b.7\]]cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad theg pa
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong [#]ba gang zhe na/_'di lta
[\[241a.2\]]ste/_sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[241a.3\]]dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du de dag
[\[241a.4\]]tu gtub cing gshegs [#]pa dang /_brdung zhing btso ba dang /_sreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o/_/de la
[\[241a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]dad pas bkur sti byed pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thams cad la nga rgyal bcag pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dud pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dad pas bkur
[\[241a.6\]]sti byed pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par
[\[241a.7\]]bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
[\[241b.2\]]gang ji bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su bzung bar bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]mang du thos pas [#]mi ngoms pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/_
[\[241b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sbyin pa de chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[241b.4\]]po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing bdag dang gzhan gyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni
[\[241b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar
[\[241b.6\]]bstan na sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di [#]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu
[\[241b.7\]]med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[242a.2\]]dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong [#]ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dod pa mi skyed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[242a.3\]]chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[242a.4\]]dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa yongs su mi gtong [#]ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtog par 'jog pa'i bzod pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtong [#]ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[242a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong [#]ba gang zhe na/_bslab pa thams cad la sgyu med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong [#]ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smod [#]pa
[\[242a.6\]]gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams
[\[242a.7\]]cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtong ba gang zhe na/_phyi nang gi chos
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa la de'i sems mi gnas pa gang
[\[242b.2\]]yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [#]zhum pa med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos [#]pa med pa gang zhe na/_dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[242b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos [#]pa med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang /_mgo bregs shing ngur smrig
[\[242b.4\]]gi gos bgo ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam yang lhan
[\[242b.5\]]cig mi gnas shing de'i rgyus yongs su brkam [#]pa'i sems mi bskyed de/_de'i rgyus gos 'thob par yang mi byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la
[\[242b.6\]]ser sna byed pa yongs su spong ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar
[\[242b.7\]]'gyur na/_de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bar bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am/_de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/_de dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa [#]skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur
[\[243a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par [#]mi bya ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya [#]ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba gang yin zhe na/_
[\[243a.3\]]gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing 'thab mo'i sems sam rtsod pa'i sems kyi [#]go mi 'byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya [#]ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag
[\[243a.4\]]bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang
[\[243a.5\]]ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
[\[243a.6\]]yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/_'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta ci [#]smos kyang mi dgos kyis [#]spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[243a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam [#]yongs su spang bar bya ba'o[#]/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_gang gis nga rgyal
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa la [#]lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang [#]bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang yin
[\[243b.2\]]zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci
[\[243b.3\]]log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_dngos po mi dmigs pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid gnyis spang bar bya ba gang
[\[243b.4\]]zhe na/_gang gi phyir chos thams cad yid gnyis dang bral bar mthong ba gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid gnyis spang bar bya ba yin no/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti
[\[243b.5\]]mug nyams rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug nyams rangs su mi 'dor ba'o/_/
[\[243b.6\]]de la sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang yin [#]zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol
[\[243b.7\]]tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas shes par bya ba'i rgya mtsho lnga'i
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/phyin to/_/phyin par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol
[\[244a.2\]]tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no/_/rang
[\[244a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sems spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no/_/yongs su chad pa'i sems spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no/_/slong ba mthong na zhum pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di
[\[244a.4\]]ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no/_/dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no/_/slong ba po spang bar mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin te/_de ltar byang chub
[\[244a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin
[\[244a.6\]]par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na sems can dang /_srog dang gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
[\[244a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gang la [#]yang skye ba med[#]/_de la rtag pa med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i
[\[244b.2\]]'du shes su mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar lta
[\[244b.3\]]ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di
[\[244b.4\]]ltar chos de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/_
[\[244b.5\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir[#]/_
[\[244b.6\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de la [#]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar
[\[244b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten nas/_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]sangs rgyas su mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la
[\[245a.2\]]brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
[\[245a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir[#]/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par
[\[245a.4\]]chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pa'i [#]tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub
[\[245a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi/_rang
[\[245a.6\]]gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pas
[\[245a.7\]]stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]pa nyid nye bar bzung nas yongs su rdzogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o[#]/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[245b.2\]]chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med
[\[245b.3\]]pa shes pa [#]zhe na/_de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi gnas pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_dge ba bcu'i
[\[245b.4\]]las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad [#]la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/_snying
[\[245b.5\]]rje chen po thob pa gang yin pa ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/_
[\[245b.6\]]byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/_chos thams cad la bsnan
[\[245b.7\]]pa dang dbri ba med pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/_chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]med pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang zhe na/_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa
[\[246a.2\]]dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni
[\[246a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/_gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
[\[246a.4\]]thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang zhe na/_chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal
[\[246a.5\]]ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes dang /_lta ba rnam par bzlog [#]pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes dang /_lta ba rnam par ldog [#]pa'o/_/
