[\[246a.6\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/_bag chags kyis mtshams [#]sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa'o/_/de la byang chub
[\[246a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/_khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/_dbang po drug yang dag par
[\[246b.2\]]'dus pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[246b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa'i sa ma yin pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_skye mched drug gi btang snyoms gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa'i sa ma yin pa'i shes pa'o/_/
[\[246b.4\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang yang dag par mthong zhing 'di las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ba yin pa
[\[246b.5\]]ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa gang zhe na/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su gang dang gang la dga' ba de la ji ltar dga' bar rang gi
[\[246b.6\]]ngo bo de dang de ston pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na/_sems gcig gis
[\[246b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ba gang zhe na/_mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas lta ba'i phyir 'gro yang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'o/_/
[\[247a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
[\[247a.3\]]su gtong zhing des rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bsgrub [#]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la [#]bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la
[\[247a.4\]]phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la [#]bsnyen bkur ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs [#]pa gang zhe na/_chos kyi sku
[\[247a.5\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs [#]par byed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku [#]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na/_
[\[247a.6\]]stobs bcu la gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po [#]mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi
[\[247a.7\]]zhing yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bya ba thams cad byed kyang de'i [#]sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la byang chub
[\[247b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag [#]pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na
[\[247b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub [#]pa gang yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de
[\[247b.4\]]ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su bsgrub [#]pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
[\[247b.5\]]ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji ltar
[\[247b.6\]]smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o[#]/_/de
[\[247b.7\]]la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]khong du chud pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par bya ba khong du [#]chud pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa
[\[248a.2\]]shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[248a.3\]]chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la
[\[248a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen por skye ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[248a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la
[\[248a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rgyud du skye ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[248a.7\]]chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la sems can rnams bkod cing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang zhing de dag thams cad rnam
[\[248b.2\]]par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo bar byed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[248b.3\]]chen po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing /_sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/
[\[248b.4\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang /_lhun bai DUr+yar 'dug pa dang /_yal ga rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
[\[248b.5\]]bzhin las grub pa dang /_me tog dang lo ma rin po che [#]sna tshogs las gyur [#]pa dang /_shing de'i dri zhim [#]po dang /_'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par bkang ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi zhing [#]gi rgyan phun sum tshogs
[\[248b.6\]]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa gang yin pa ste/_
[\[248b.7\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[249a.2\]]kyi ye shes dang /_bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang [#]yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin
[\[249a.3\]]gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu pa gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[249a.4\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan
[\[249a.5\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
[\[249a.6\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'das te/_rab 'byor
[\[249a.7\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dgu pa [#]las yongs su 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]theg pa chen po la yang
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sa'i [#]tshogs so/_/[#]rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang [#]'di skad du theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[249b.2\]]nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa mtshan
[\[249b.3\]]nyid gcig pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni nges par 'byung ba'am/_'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/_rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos
[\[249b.4\]]kyi dbyings nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' nges
[\[249b.5\]]par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings nges
[\[249b.6\]]par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags spangs pa'i dbyings nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral
[\[249b.7\]]ba'i dbyings nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gog pa'i dbyings nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed rnams stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid nges par 'byung
[\[250a.2\]]bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed rnams stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa
[\[250a.3\]]stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas
[\[250a.4\]]stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna stong pa nyid dang /_lce
[\[250a.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_lus stong pa nyid dang /_yid stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna stong pa nyid
[\[250a.6\]]dang /_lce stong pa nyid dang /_lus stong pa nyid dang /_yid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_
[\[250a.7\]]yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgra stong pa nyid dang /_dri stong
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pa nyid dang /_ro stong pa nyid dang /_reg stong pa nyid dang /_chos stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/sgra dang /_
[\[250b.2\]]dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_
[\[250b.3\]]chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de [#]ni rna ba'i rnam
[\[250b.4\]]par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa
[\[250b.5\]]stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_yid
[\[250b.6\]]kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam
[\[250b.7\]]par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
[\[251a.2\]]dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong
[\[251a.3\]]pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor
[\[251a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i
[\[251a.5\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
[\[251a.6\]]gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar
[\[251a.7\]]'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni [#]mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\](]'das [,]'dus [)]te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa
[\[251b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_
[\[251b.3\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen [#]gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rmi
[\[251b.4\]]lam nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nges par 'byung
[\[251b.5\]]bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rmi lam ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_de
[\[251b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_
[\[251b.7\]]gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyis bzung [#]ba'i rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po yin no/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i [#]pha rol tu phyin pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[252a.2\]]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
[\[252a.3\]]med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[252a.4\]]pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[252a.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nang stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab
[\[252a.6\]]'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid nges par [#]'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan
[\[252a.7\]]nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]gnas pa med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/dngos po med pa'i
[\[252b.2\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[252b.3\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/[#]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
[\[252b.4\]]nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i
[\[252b.5\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/_yang dag par spong ba rnams [#]dang /_rdzu 'phrul
[\[252b.6\]]gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[252b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams
[\[253a.2\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges
[\[253a.3\]]par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_tshad med pa [#]rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
[\[253a.4\]]rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[253a.5\]]ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_so so
[\[253a.6\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
[\[253a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong pa'i phyir ro/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong pa'i
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyis [#]gzung ba'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor [#]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar
[\[253b.2\]]'dod pa de ni rang sangs rgyas nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod
[\[253b.3\]]pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/
[\[253b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra
[\[253b.5\]]bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par
[\[253b.6\]]'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_
[\[253b.7\]]lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/lan cig phyir
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
[\[254a.2\]]gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_
[\[254a.3\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par
[\[254a.4\]]'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ming nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan ma nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni brda nges par
[\[254a.5\]]'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tha snyad nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bdag med [#]pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/
[\[254a.6\]]rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/
[\[254a.7\]]brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/gdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/brda stong pa
[\[254b.2\]]nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/tha snyad stong pa nyid ni [#]tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar
[\[254b.3\]]'dod pa de ni skye ba med pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa [#]nges par 'byung bar
[\[254b.4\]]'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya
[\[254b.5\]]ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni [#]skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_
[\[254b.6\]]rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa [#]de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs 'dis ni [#]'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes
[\[254b.7\]]par bya ste/_theg pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no//_//bam po bcu dgu pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni theg pa chen po de
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de[#]/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad [#]mi gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin
[\[255a.2\]]mi gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin/_mi gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags [#]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas
[\[255a.3\]]pa ma yin/_mi gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis [#]stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa [#]ma yin
[\[255a.4\]]mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa [#]med pa ni mngon
[\[255a.5\]]par 'du byed pa med pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mngon par 'du byed pa med [#]pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa [#]ma yin/_mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni gang
[\[255a.6\]]du yang mi gnas te/_gnas pa med pa'i tshul dang /_g.yo ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ma [#]yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur [#]zhes smras pa ni/_
[\[255a.7\]]theg pa des gang yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang /_gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes
[\[255b.2\]]bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_
[\[255b.3\]]skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir
[\[255b.4\]]skye ba med pa [#]dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa rnams dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams dmigs su med do/_/mtha'
[\[255b.5\]]las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu
[\[255b.6\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid
[\[255b.7\]]dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas [#]rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid [#]dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gzhag pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su
[\[256a.2\]]med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[256a.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha'
[\[256a.4\]]las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par
[\[256a.5\]]dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
[\[256a.6\]]dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes
[\[256a.7\]]pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sa dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri ma med pa dang /_'od byed pa dang /_'od 'phro ba dang /_sbyang dka' ba dang /_
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]mngon du gyur pa dang /_ring du song ba dang /_mi g.yo ba dang /_legs pa'i blo gros dang /_chos kyi sprin dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do/_/
[\[256b.2\]]mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir da ltar byung ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_'grib pa dang 'phel ba dmigs su med do/_/gang mi dmigs pas dmigs su med pa yin
[\[256b.3\]]zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs pas dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pas [#]mi dmigs pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir
[\[256b.4\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do/_/skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi [#]byed pa med pa mi dmigs pas mngon par 'du mi [#]byed pa med pa dmigs su
[\[256b.5\]]med do/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched mi dmigs pas phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dmigs su med do/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[256b.6\]]dmigs su med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/_/nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs
[\[256b.7\]]pas nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi dmigs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigs su med do/_/yang dag par spong ba
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam mi dmigs pas lam dmigs su med do/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs pas bsam gtan dang /_tshad med
[\[257a.2\]]pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dmigs su med de[#]/_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams
[\[257a.3\]]mi dmigs pas/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med
[\[257a.4\]]do zhes bya ba ni bsgom [#]pa'i lam gzung [#]ba'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no/_/[#]rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs pas rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dmigs su med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba
[\[257a.5\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa mi dmigs pas dgra bcom pa dmigs su med do/_/rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pas rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[257a.6\]]mi dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med do zhes bya ba ni bsgom [#]pa'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po yin no/_/[#]mtha' las
[\[257a.7\]]'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]sangs rgyas nyid dang /_sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa rab tu dga' ba mi dmigs pas sa rab tu dga' ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dri ma med pa
[\[257b.2\]]mi dmigs pas sa [#]dri ma med pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa 'od byed pa mi dmigs pas sa 'od byed pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa 'od 'phro ba mi dmigs pas sa 'od 'phro ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las
[\[257b.3\]]'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa sbyang dka' ba mi dmigs pas sa sbyang dka' ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa mngon du gyur pa mi dmigs pas sa mngon du gyur pa dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa ring du
[\[257b.4\]]song ba mi dmigs pas sa ring du song ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa mi g.yo ba mi dmigs pas sa mi g.yo ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa legs pa'i blo gros mi dmigs pas sa legs pa'i blo gros dmigs
[\[257b.5\]]su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin mi dmigs pas sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang sa bcu rnams mi dmigs pas sa bcu rnams dmigs su med do/_/sa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkar po rnam par
[\[257b.6\]]mthong ba'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/_nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmigs
[\[257b.7\]]su med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sa dang po dmigs su med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mtha' las
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung [#]na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
[\[258a.2\]]gyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung [#]na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
[\[258a.3\]]bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do/_/mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir
[\[258a.4\]]mig lnga dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'dzin
[\[258a.5\]]pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no/_/[#]de dag gis ni tshogs kyi bsgrub [#]pa bstan to/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
[\[258a.6\]]mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' sems can gzhal du med pa/_grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems
[\[258a.7\]]can gzhal du ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis/_tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed de/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba mi mthong /_'ong ba dang
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba mi dmigs/_'ong ba mi dmigs/_gnas pa mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus
[\[258b.2\]]mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [#]mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/de ltar [#]na 'di ni theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de
[\[258b.3\]]bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po gang yin pa 'di dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[258b.4\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
[\[258b.5\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de[#]/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor
[\[258b.6\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
[\[258b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/_'di ni
[\[259a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan [#]yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras pa ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
[\[259a.3\]]'jig rten gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams te/_rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin nyid du gyur cing ma nor ba [#]de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid [#]yin te/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa de kho
[\[259a.4\]]na ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug [#]mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'on kyang
[\[259a.5\]]'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun tu bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
[\[259a.6\]]zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin nyid du 'gyur zhing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma [#]yin te/_phyin ci ma log pa yang yang [#]dag pa de kho na ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
[\[259a.7\]]po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'on kyang gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa kun tu [(]bsdan [,]bstan [)]pa tsam
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te/_'di thams cad ni mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang [#]mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i
[\[259b.2\]]khams de bzhin nyid du gyur cing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yin te/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha
[\[259b.3\]]ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te/_'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos
[\[259b.4\]]can te/_dngos po med pas [#]de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin nyid du 'gyur zhing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji
[\[259b.5\]]lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing mi [#]brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags [#]pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun
[\[259b.6\]]du bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin [#]ma yin pa yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes
[\[259b.7\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi
[\[260a.2\]]brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te mig de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin
[\[260a.3\]]ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid [#]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha [#]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi[#]/_rab
[\[260a.4\]]'byor mig de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
[\[260a.5\]]rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin [#]rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
[\[260a.6\]]zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi [#]mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor yid de rnam par brtags [#]pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yin zhing 'di
[\[260a.7\]]thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan [#]la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/[ #]dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
[\[260b.2\]]'gyur te/_rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa [#]tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin [#]ma yin pa yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]
[\[260b.3\]]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil [#]gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing
[\[260b.4\]]brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun
[\[260b.5\]]du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin [#]zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal
[\[260b.6\]]te mig gi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid ma nor ba [#]de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do[#]/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
[\[260b.7\]]mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_
[\[261a.2\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_
[\[261a.3\]]dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs [#]pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin
[\[261a.4\]]zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//_//bam po nyi shu pa/_rab 'byor gal te mig gi
[\[261a.5\]]'dus te reg pa de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de[#]/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
[\[261a.6\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_
[\[261a.7\]]dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg [#]
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]pa de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
[\[261b.2\]]rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa[#]/_kun du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po
[\[261b.3\]]med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba [#]de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de[#]/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa
[\[261b.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
[\[261b.5\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags [#]pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
[\[261b.6\]]du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi
[\[261b.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid [#]gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de[#]/_phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin [#]yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_kun du bstan pa tsam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing
[\[262a.2\]]'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_
[\[262a.3\]]dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
[\[262a.4\]]rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
[\[262a.5\]]mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po med pa la [#]dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod
[\[262a.6\]]pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha
[\[262a.7\]]ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang
[\[262b.2\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
[\[262b.3\]]te/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni
[\[262b.4\]]theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin
[\[262b.5\]]no/_/rab 'byor gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir
[\[262b.6\]]theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
[\[262b.7\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar [#]mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po
[\[263a.2\]]med [#]la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_
[\[263a.3\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam
[\[263a.4\]]yan lag brgyad pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang
[\[263a.5\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang [#]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi
[\[263a.6\]]chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mchog nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po
[\[263a.7\]]yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te[#]/_rab 'byor rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang [#]/_byang chub
[\[263b.2\]]sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin
[\[263b.3\]]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rigs kyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
[\[263b.4\]]zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor rigs kyi sa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_
[\[263b.5\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis
[\[263b.6\]]kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
[\[263b.7\]]pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni spang ba'i [#]nges par 'byung ba'o/_/[#]
[\[264a.2\]]rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung [#]ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
[\[264a.3\]]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa phyin chad snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag thams cad dngos po med la [#]dngos
[\[264a.4\]]po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni byang chub
[\[264a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyis [#]mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud cing [#]/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang [#]ldan pa thob par yang mi 'gyur/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
[\[264a.6\]]'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyis [#]mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
[\[264a.7\]]dngos po med par khong du chud de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa yang thob[#]/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing gzi brjid
[\[264b.2\]]dang dpal gyis lham mer mi 'gyur/_lhan ner mi 'gyur/_lhang nger mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[264b.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te [#]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[264b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par mi mdzad de/_rab 'byor
[\[264b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med de dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par
[\[264b.6\]]'gengs par mdzad do/_/rab 'byor gal te [#]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[264b.7\]]sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang mi mdzad de/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med la dngos po
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]yod pa [#]ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
[\[265a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am
[\[265a.3\]]gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bskor bar yang mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo [#]dngos po med de/_dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[265a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa 'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa rab tu bskor ro/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[265a.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur
[\[265a.6\]]te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po med de/_dngos po ma yin pas [#]de'i phyir sems can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su [#]yongs su mya ngan las
[\[265a.7\]]'da'o/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o/_/[#]gsum po 'di dag ni ched du bya ba'i nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni de [#]de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor [# ]
[\[265b\]]
