[\[285a.6\]]dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
[\[285a.7\]]dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i
[\[285b.2\]]mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[285b.3\]]phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang
[\[285b.4\]]yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[285b.5\]]yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar
[\[285b.6\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [#]dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang [#]/_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa [#]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[285b.7\]]ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
[\[286a.2\]]sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad
[\[286a.3\]]med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid
[\[286a.4\]]med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[286a.5\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang
[\[286a.6\]]dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[286a.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
[\[286b.2\]]dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag [#]pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan
[\[286b.3\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar
[\[286b.4\]]gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i
[\[286b.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
[\[286b.6\]]mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[286b.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[287a.2\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi
[\[287a.3\]]yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir
[\[287a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags
[\[287a.5\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems
[\[287a.6\]]dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[287a.7\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[287b.2\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub
[\[287b.3\]]sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang
[\[287b.4\]]yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'
[\[287b.5\]]dang /_dbus su byang chub sems dpa' nye bar mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i
[\[287b.6\]]mtha' stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa nyid [#]dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i [#]sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin med pa nas/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i
[\[287b.7\]]bar du med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa nyid [#]dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ma yin/_dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin/_gzungs kyi sgo yang gzhan ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
[\[288a.2\]]ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus kyang gzhan ma yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa nas/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid
[\[288a.3\]]med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag [#]thams cad ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'
[\[288a.4\]]dang /_dbus rnams dmigs su med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [#]mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan
[\[288a.5\]]thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos
[\[288a.6\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo
[\[288a.7\]]nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]so/_/rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//_//bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
[\[288b.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub [#]
[\[288b.3\]]sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/
[\[288b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas stong pa nyid
[\[288b.5\]]dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
[\[288b.6\]]mthar mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nyan thos med
[\[288b.7\]]pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa nas [#]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang [#]/_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]ma yin/_stong pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_nyan thos kyang gzhan ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
[\[289a.2\]]gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no[#]/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na nyan thos med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar med pa dang /_stong pa [#]dang /_dben
[\[289a.3\]]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
[\[289a.4\]]mthar mi dmigs so/_/phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams su mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba dgag pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o[#]/_/tshor ba
[\[289a.5\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[289a.6\]]rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' [#]ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/_/tshe dang
[\[289a.7\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kun du mtha' yas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
[\[289b.2\]]dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye mched rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam
[\[289b.3\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta
[\[289b.4\]]ste dper na/_nam mkha' la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas
[\[289b.5\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du
[\[289b.6\]]mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
[\[289b.7\]]lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la gzugs med/_stong pa nyid la
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' med/_stong pa nyid la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med/_stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
[\[290a.2\]]lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_
[\[290a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[290a.4\]]ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med/_
[\[290a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/_byang chub sems dpa' med
[\[290a.6\]]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo [#]/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam
[\[290a.7\]]yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]yan lag brgyad pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[290b.2\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/chos kyi dbyings
[\[290b.3\]]ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong [#]/_de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong /_thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong [#]/_lam
[\[290b.4\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid kyis stong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/[#]nyan thos kyi theg
[\[290b.5\]]pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /_nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong /_rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[290b.6\]]stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med/_rang [#]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bar du med/_nyan thos med/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
[\[290b.7\]]ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad du smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs

[\[291a.3\]]dmigs so/_/'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la
[\[291a.4\]]med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du
[\[291a.5\]]byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs
[\[291a.6\]]so/_/sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang /_rna ba dang /_
[\[291a.7\]]sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang rna ba dang sna dang /_lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med

[\[291b.3\]]dang dri dang ro ni reg [#]la med cing mi dmigs so/_/reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so/_/reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/_/chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/_/chos
[\[291b.4\]]ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
[\[291b.5\]]la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/_sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi
[\[291b.6\]]dmigs so/_/[#]sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa

[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi [#]dmigs so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i

[\[292a.4\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te

[\[292a.7\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi [#]'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i

[\[292b.3\]]reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/

[\[292b.5\]]ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la [#]med cing mi dmigs so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las

[\[292b.7\]]pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi

[\[293a.4\]]byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
[\[293a.5\]]ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
[\[293a.6\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi
[\[293a.7\]]dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi [#]dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]la med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/_/ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzungs kyi sgo ni ting nge 'dzin la
