[\[307a.7\]]ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/
[\[307b.2\]]mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang /_
[\[307b.3\]]mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya
[\[307b.4\]]bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
[\[307b.5\]]ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[307b.6\]]zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar
[\[307b.7\]]yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan
[\[308a.2\]]ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
[\[308a.3\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/
[\[308a.4\]]zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/
[\[308a.5\]]dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/
[\[308a.6\]]zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben
[\[308a.7\]]zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi
[\[308b.2\]]rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su
[\[308b.3\]]mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/
[\[308b.4\]]dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces
[\[308b.5\]]bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su
[\[308b.6\]]mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [#]med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[308b.7\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar
[\[309a.2\]]yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
[\[309a.3\]]rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/stong zhes bya ba dang mi
[\[309a.4\]]mi [#]stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/_/'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa shA
[\[309a.5\]]ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos 'di dag la yongs su rtog [#]pa'i tshul gyis de ltar yongs su mi rtog go/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/_tshor
[\[309a.6\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams
[\[309a.7\]]cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA
[\[309b.2\]]ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
[\[309b.3\]]rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de [#]rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe
[\[309b.4\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe
[\[309b.5\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol
[\[309b.6\]]tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin
[\[309b.7\]]no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_
[\[310a.2\]]gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des [#]na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de [#]phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
[\[310a.3\]]nyid kyi bar gyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
[\[310a.4\]]bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin
[\[310a.5\]]no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/_gang stong pa
[\[310a.6\]]de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de [#]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[310a.7\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi [#]chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi [#]ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[310b.2\]]kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni [#]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[310b.3\]]smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni [#]gzugs ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin[#]/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten
[\[310b.4\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi [#]chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs
[\[310b.5\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin[#]/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/_rab 'byor
[\[310b.6\]]gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /_'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_gnyis su
[\[310b.7\]]byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin te[#]/_gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_thogs pa med pa'i [#]mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid
[\[311a.2\]]med pa'o/_/'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[311a.3\]]pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang /_gnyis su byar med pa'i chos [#]gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang
[\[311a.4\]]ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med do[#]/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/_tshor
[\[311a.5\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang [#]rnam par shes pa ma yin/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_
[\[311a.6\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par
[\[311a.7\]]rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du gzugs zhes de ltar brjod pa gang
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]yin pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di [#]ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i bar de ltar brjod pa gang
[\[311b.2\]]yin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes zer/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs/_gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
[\[311b.3\]]bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di gzugs zhes de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa
[\[311b.4\]]nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di lta ste skye mched dang /_khams dang /_
[\[311b.5\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[311b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang [#]
[\[311b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes 'di ltar brjod pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di ltar ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_
[\[312a.2\]]gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[312a.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog [#]pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par
[\[312a.4\]]shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du skye mched rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_
[\[312a.5\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par
[\[312a.6\]]dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur[#]/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin
[\[312a.7\]]tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]par dag pa'i slad du bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_
[\[312b.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i
[\[312b.3\]]skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag
[\[312b.4\]]pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub
[\[312b.5\]]sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos [#]ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
[\[312b.6\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na gzugs kyang ma skyes la[#]/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes/_skye mched rnams [#]kyang ma skyes/_khams rnams [#]kyang ma skyes/_
[\[312b.7\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyang ma skyes/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma skyes/_stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma skyes/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang [#]ma skyes/_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]pa rnams kyang ma skyes/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma skyes
[\[313a.2\]]so so'i [#]skye bo yang ma skyes/_so so'i [#]skye bo'i chos rnams [#]kyang ma skyes/_rgyun du zhugs pa yang ma skyes/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma skyes/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes/_phyir mi 'ong ba yang ma skyes/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma
[\[313a.3\]]skyes/_dgra bcom pa yang ma skyes/_dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/_rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes/_byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes/_sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes[#]/_sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[313a.4\]]kyang ma skyes pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar gal te [#]gzugs kyang skye ba med [#]pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang skye ba med/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang skye ba med/_so so'i [#]skye bo yang skye ba med/_so so'i [#]skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med/_
[\[313a.5\]]rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/_dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/_rang sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[313a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med/_sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med [#]na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa [#]rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan
[\[313a.7\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang rnam pa
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang byang chub lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa ma [#]yin na/_ci'i phyir
[\[313b.2\]]rgyun du zhugs pas kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir lam bsgom [#]par bya/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba [#]ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs [#]pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/_phyir mi 'ong bas ni 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i [#]phyir lam bsgom
[\[313b.3\]]par bya/_dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i [#]kun du sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni rang byang chub kyi don [#]lam bsgom par bya/_ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don
[\[313b.4\]]du da ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/_ci'i phyir na [#]de bzhin gshegs pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_de skad
[\[313b.5\]]ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la thob pa'am mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/_/bdag ni ma skyes pa [#]la rgyun du zhugs pa mi 'dod do[#]/_/rgyun du zhugs
[\[313b.6\]]pa'i 'bras bu mi 'dod do[#]/_/ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba mi 'dod do[#]/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi 'dod do/_/ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba mi 'dod do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi 'dod do/_/ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa mi 'dod do[#]/_/dgra bcom pa'i
[\[313b.7\]]'bras bu mi 'dod do/_/ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas mi 'dod do[#]/_/rang sangs rgyas nyid mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dka' ba [#]spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis spyod pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la gnas pas ni [#]sems can gzhal du med/_grangs med/_tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar mi nus kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang
[\[314a.2\]]sems can thams cad [#]la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_bur 'du shes bskyed pas sems can gzhal du med/_grangs med/_tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar nus te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
[\[314a.3\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed do/_/ji ltar bdag bdag ces brjod kyang de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la yang 'du shes bskyed de/_
[\[314a.4\]]de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi [#]bskyed de/_/[#]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dod do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[314a.5\]]byang chub kyang mi 'dod do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang mi 'dod do/_/chos ma skyes pas thob pa ma skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa thob pa'am/_'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa
[\[314a.6\]]ma skyes pa thob/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa ma skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod la/_ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'o na thob pa med [#]la mngon par
[\[314a.7\]]rtogs [#]pa med dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thob pa yang yod/_mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de[#]/_gnyis ni ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thob pa 'am/_mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/_don dam par ni thob pa'am/_mngon par rtogs pa'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/_lan cig
[\[314b.2\]]phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_sangs rgyas kyang med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes [#]smra bar nus sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe
[\[314b.3\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes smra bar spobs sam zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo la ni chos ma skyes pa yang smra ba'i spobs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /_spobs pa
[\[314b.4\]]gang yin pa dang /_smra ba gang yin pa dang /_ma skyes pa gang yin pa'i [#]chos 'di dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing gzugs can ma yin zhing bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di lta ste mtshan nyid med pa'o[#]/_/shA ri'i
[\[314b.5\]]bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor smra ba yang skye ba [#]med pa/_spobs pa yang skye ba med pa/_chos kyang skye ba med pa gang las brtsams te spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_smra ba ni skye ba med do/_/spobs pa
[\[314b.6\]]ni skye ba med do/_/chos ni skye ba med do/_/gang las brtsams nas smra bar spobs par skye ba [#]yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni skye ba med do/_/de bzhin du so so
[\[314b.7\]]ba dang /_bsdus pa'i skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams skye ba med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra
[\[315a.2\]]bcom pa dang /_rang [#]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_thams cad shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni [#]de bzhin te/_smra ba ni skye ba med do/_/spobs pa ni skye ba med do/_/chos ni skye ba med do/_/gang las brtsams nas
[\[315a.3\]]smra bar [#]spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so
[\[315a.4\]]yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/_/de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du 'gro ba lnga po rnams tha dad pa yin gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
[\[315a.5\]]thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin nam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_ji ltar thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha
[\[315a.6\]]snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu don dam par ni las kyang med/_las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/_skye ba yang [#]med/_'gag pa yang med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par
[\[315a.7\]]byang ba yang med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/_'on te skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do[#]/_/skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do//_//[# ]
